The Book of Jeremiah

1 the ⁼¬declaration of·the ⁼God which was·generated·himself upon °¬Jeremiah ⁼the·one of·the Chelkiou out of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ which housed·down in Anathōth in to·earth of·¬Benjamin

2 which was·been·generated saying of·the ⁼God unto °him in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Josiah ⁼son ⁼¬Amos ⁼king ⁼Yudah of·year ⁼¬thirteenth in to·the ⁼kingdom of·him

3 and was·generated·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah till of·eleventh ⁼year Sedekia of·son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah till of·the ⁼battlechained ⁼Yerushalam in to·the ⁼fifth ⁼month

4 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

5 ¬before of·the·one °me to·¬mold °you in to·belly I·¬know·myself °you and ¬before of·the·one °you to·come·out out of·motherhood I·have·made·holy °you °¬prophet to °nations⁺ I·have·put °you

6 and I·told ¬oh! master ⁼lord ¬¡see! not I·¬know·myself to·speak ¬that young I* I·am

7 and told lord unto °me ńot ꜝsay ¬that young I* I·am ¬that unto °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ifᵮ I·should·¬send·out °you you·will·go·yourself and ¬by °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you you·will·speak

8 ńot you·should·be·afraid off of·face of·them ¬that with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you says lord

9 and ¬stretched·out lord °the ⁼hand of·him unto °me and touched·himself of·the ⁼mouth of·me and told lord unto °me ¬¡see! I·have·given °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me to °the ⁼mouth of·you

10 ¬¡see! I·have·¬appointed °you today upon °nations⁺ and °kingdoms⁺ to·¬uproot and to·¬ruin and to·destroy and to·¬rebuild and to·¬plant

11 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying °what you you·see ¬Jeremiah and I·told °¬staff ⁼¬of·walnut

12 and told lord unto °me beautifully you·have·seen ¬because I·have·¬arisen I* upon °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me of·the·one to·do °them

13 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me out of·second saying °what you you·see and I·told °¬kettle ⁼self-¬firing·up and the ⁼face of·him off of·face of·north

14 and told lord unto °me off of·face of·north will·be·¬been·enflamed the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼earth

15 ¬because ¬¡see! I* I·¬call·together °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ off of·north of·the ⁼earth says lord and they·will·arrive and they·will·put each °the ⁼throne of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼walls⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah

16 and I·will·speak unto °them with of·judgment about of·all ⁼the ⁼badness of·them as they·¬left·behind °me and they·¬sacrificed to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ and they·worshipped to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them

17 and you ꜝ¬gird·yourself °the ⁼¬loins of·you and ꜝstand·uꝑ and ꜝtell unto °them °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you ńot you·should·be·afraid off of·face of·them ńot·then you·should·be·¬frightened ¬in·front·of of·them ¬that with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you says lord

18 ¬¡see! I·have·put °you in to·the·one today to·day as °city ⁼¬fortified and as °wall ⁼copper ⁼¬fortified to·¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and to·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·him and to·the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth

19 and they·will·war °you and not ńot they·should·have·power·themselves unto °you ¬because with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you told lord

2 and told °¬these⁺ says lord I·was·memoried of·mercy of·youth of·you and of·love ⁼completion of·you of·the·one to·¬follow °you to·the ⁼holy ⁼Yisra’el says lord

3 ⁼holy of·Yisra’el to·the ⁼lord ¬beginning of·¬offsprings⁺ of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬eating °him ¬??? bad⁺ will·arrive upon °them ¬asserts lord

4 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord house of·Ya‘aqob and all ⁼paternity of·house ⁼Yisra’el

5 °¬these⁺ says lord °what they·found the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ in to·me* °¬trespass ¬that they·¬left °¬long off myˊ and they·were·gone ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼vain⁺ and they·were·¬made·futile

6 and not they·told ¬where? is lord ⁼the ⁼¬leading °us out of·earth ⁼Egypt the ⁼¬directing °us in to·the ⁼¬desert in to·earth ⁼¬unacquainted and to·¬impassable in to·earth ⁼¬waterless and to·¬unfruitful in to·earth in to·which not ¬went·through in to·her no·one and not housed·down there son of·human

7 and they·¬brought·in °you⁺ to °the Karmēlon of·the·one to·¬eat °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·him and you⁺·came·to and you⁺·defiled °the ⁼earth of·me and °the ⁼law-lot of·me you⁺·put·yourselves⁺ to °¬abomination

8 the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ not they·told ¬where? is lord and the⁺ ⁼self-¬clinging·to of·the ⁼law not they·¬knew·themselves °me and the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ they·were·irreverent to °me* and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ they·¬prophesied to·the ⁼Baal and ¬after of·¬useless they·were·gone

9 through °this still I·will·be·judged unto °you⁺ says lord and unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ I·will·be·judged

10 ¬because ꜝ¬pass·through⁺ to °islands⁺ Chettiim and ꜝsee⁺ and to Kēdar ꜝmission·off⁺ and ꜝ¬understand⁺ very and ꜝsee⁺ if has·been·generated ¬such·as·this⁺

11 if they·will·¬change·themselves nations⁺ °Gods⁺ of·them and these⁺ not they·are Gods⁺ then the ⁼people of·me ¬changed·himself °the ⁼glory of·him out of·which not they·will·be·¬helped

12 ¬amazed the ⁼heaven upon to·this and ¬shuddered upon °¬greater very says lord

13 ¬that two °evil⁺ did the ⁼people of·me °me* they·¬left·behind °¬flow of·water of·life and they·¬dug to·¬selves⁺ °¬pits⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken which⁺ not they·will·have·power·themselves °water to·¬hold

14 ńot servant is Yisra’el or ¬native-born·servant is through °what to °¬plunder was·generated·himself

15 upon °him they·¬roared·themselves lions⁺ and they·gave °the ⁼voice of·them which⁺ they·¬appointed °the ⁼earth of·him to °¬desert and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·him they·¬ruined ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-house·down

16 and sons⁺ Memfeōs and Tafnas they·knew °you and they·¬mocked of·you

17 ¬not! °these⁺ did to·you °the·one to·¬leave·behind °you °me* says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you

18 and now °what to·you and to·the ⁼path of·Egypt of·the·one to·drink °water Gēōn and °what to·you and to·the ⁼path Assuriōn of·the·one to·drink °water of·¬rivers⁺

19 will·¬instruct °you the ⁼¬apostasy of·you and the ⁼badness of·you will·¬rebuke °you and ꜝknow and ꜝsee ¬that ¬bitter to·you the·one to·¬leave·behind °you °me* says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you and not I·¬delighted upon to·you says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you

20 ¬that off of·eternity you·¬broke °the ⁼yoke of·you you·¬tore·apart °the⁺ ⁼bonds⁺ of·you and you·told not I·will·serve but I·will·go·myself upon °all ⁼¬hill ⁼upward and ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬shady there I·will·be·¬diffused in to·the ⁼fornication of·me

21 I* then I·¬planted °you °vine ⁼¬fruitbearing ⁼all ⁼¬true ¬how?! you·were·turned to °¬bitterness the ⁼vine ⁼the ⁼¬another's

22 ifᵮ you·should·¬wash·off·yourself in to·¬bleach and you·should·multiply to·yourself °¬herbage you·have·¬spotted·yourself in to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·you ¬in·front·of myˊ says lord

23 ¬how?! you·will·¬say not I·was·defiled and ¬after of·the ⁼Baal not I·was·gone ꜝsee °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you in to·the ⁼¬cemetery and ꜝknow °what you·did ¬late voice of·her ¬wailed °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·her

24 broadened upon °waters⁺ of·¬desert in to·¬desires⁺ of·soul of·her ¬was·carried·by·wind·himself was·¬delivered what will·¬turn °her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼seeking °her not they·will·¬labor in to·the ⁼¬lowliness of·her they·will·find °her

25 ꜝ¬turn·away °the ⁼foot of·you off of·path ⁼¬rough and °the ⁼¬throat of·you off of·thirst the·one then told I·will·¬act·like·a·man·myself ¬that has·loved °¬another's⁺ and ¬after of·them went·himself

26 as ¬shame of·thief ¬when should·¬capture thus they·will·be·¬been·ashamed the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them

27 to·the ⁼¬wood they·told ¬that father of·me you·are you and to·the ⁼stone you you·engendered °me and they·turned upon °me* °spines⁺ and not °faces⁺ of·them and in to·the ⁼¬time of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·them they·will·¬say ꜝstand·uꝑ and ꜝsave °us

28 and ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·you °which⁺ you·did to·yourself if they·will·stand·uꝑ·themselves and they·will·save °you in to·¬time of·the ⁼¬oppression of·you ¬that ¬by °number of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·you they·were Gods⁺ of·you Yudah and ¬by °number of·¬corridors⁺ of·the ⁼Yerushalam they·¬sacrificed to·the ⁼Baal

29 so·that °what you⁺·speak unto °me all⁺ you⁺ you⁺·were·irreverent and all⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬acted·lawlessly to °me* says lord

30 vainly I·¬struck °the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·you⁺ °¬discipline not you⁺·¬received·yourselves⁺ ¬sword ¬devoured °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·you⁺ as lion ⁼destroying and not you⁺·were·afraid

31 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord °¬these⁺ says lord ńot ¬desert I·was·generated·myself to·the ⁼Yisra’el or earth ⁼having·self-¬made·barren through °what told the ⁼people of·me not we·will·be·been·lord and not we·will·arrive unto °you still

32 ńot will·¬forget·himself bride °the ⁼cosmos of·her and virgin °the ⁼¬breastband of·her then the ⁼people of·me ¬forgot·himself of·me °days⁺ of·which⁺ not is number

33 °what still °beautiful you·will·¬apply in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you of·the·one to·seek °¬affection not thus but and you you·¬acted·wickedly·yourself of·the·one to·defile °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you

34 and in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you they·were·found °bloods⁺ of·souls⁺ ⁼¬innocent⁺ not in to·¬ditches⁺ they·found °them but upon to·all ⁼¬oak

35 and you·told ¬innocent I·am but ꜝlet·be·¬turned·away the ⁼¬wrath of·him off myˊ ¬¡see! I* I·judge·myself unto °you in to·the·one to·say °you not I·sinned

36 °what you·¬despised very of·the·one to·¬repeat °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you and off of·Egypt you·will·be·¬dishonored ¬as you·were·¬dishonored off Assour

37 ¬that and ¬from·here you·will·come·out·yourself and the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you upon of·the ⁼head of·you ¬that ¬rejected·himself lord °the ⁼hope of·you and not you·will·be·¬gotten·along·well in to·her

3 ifᵮ should·¬send·out man °the ⁼woman of·him and should·come·off off of·him and should·be·generated·himself to·man ⁼óther ńot ¬returning will·¬return unto °him still not self-defiling will·be·defiled the ⁼woman ⁼that and you you·fornicated·out in to·¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ and you·¬returned unto °me says lord

2 ꜝ¬take·up to °¬straight °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you and ꜝsee ¬where? ¬not! you·were·¬defiled upon to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ you·¬seated to·them ¬like ¬crowbar ⁼¬layed·waste and you·defiled °the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼fornications⁺ of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼badnesses⁺ of·you

3 and you·had °¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ to °¬stumbling·block to·yourself ¬face of·fornicator was·generated·himself to·you ¬cast·shame unto °all⁺

4 not as °house °me you·called and °father and °¬founder of·the ⁼virginhood of·you

5 ńot will·¬remain to °the ⁼eternity or will·be·¬protected to °¬altercation ¬¡see! you·spoke and you·did °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you·were·had·power

6 and told lord unto °me in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Josiah ⁼the ⁼king you·saw °which⁺ did to·me the ⁼housing-down of·the ⁼Yisra’el they·were·gone upon °all ⁼mountain ⁼upward and ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬woods and they·fornicated there

7 and I·told with °the·one to·fornicate °her °these⁺ ⁼all⁺ unto °me ꜝ¬live and not ¬lived and saw °the ⁼¬breach-of-contract of·her the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah

8 and I·saw ¬because about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ was·¬grasped in to·which⁺ adulterized·himself the ⁼housing-down of·the ⁼Yisra’el and I·¬sended·out °her and I·gave to·her °booklet of·¬divorce to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her and not was·afraid the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah and was·gone and fornicated and she

9 and was·generated·himself to °no·one the ⁼fornication of·her and adulterized °the ⁼¬wood and °the ⁼stone

10 and in to·all⁺ ⁼these⁺ not was·¬turned unto °me the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah out of·the ⁼whole ⁼heart of·her but upon to·lie

11 and told lord unto °me justified °the ⁼soul of·him Yisra’el off of·the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah

12 ꜝgo·yourself and ꜝ¬read °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ unto °north and you·will·¬say ꜝbe·¬turned unto °me the ⁼housing-down of·the ⁼Yisra’el says lord and not I·will·¬establish °the ⁼face of·me upon °you⁺ ¬that ¬merciful I* I·am says lord and not I·will·¬be·infuriated to·you⁺ to °the ⁼eternity

13 ¬but ꜝknow °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·you ¬that to °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you you·were·irreverent and you·¬diffused °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you to °¬another's⁺ ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬woods then of·the ⁼voice of·me not you·¬obeyed says lord

14 ꜝbe·¬turned⁺ sons⁺ having·¬left says lord ¬because I* I·will·¬master of·you⁺ and I·will·take·myself °you⁺ °one out of·city and two out of·paternity and I·will·¬bring·in °you⁺ to °¬Zion

15 and I·will·give to·you⁺ °¬flocksmans⁺ ¬by °the ⁼heart of·me and they·will·¬flocksman °you⁺ ¬flocksmaning with of·¬higher·knowledge

16 and will·be·himself ifᵮ you⁺·should·be·multiplied and you⁺·should·be·¬grown upon of·the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ says lord not they·will·¬say still ark of·¬covenant of·holy ⁼Yisra’el not will·ascend·himself upon °heart not will·be·named not·then will·be·¬visited and not will·be·done still

17 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ and in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that they·will·call °the ⁼Yerushalam throne of·lord and they·will·be·¬assembled to °her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and not they·will·go·themselves still ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·them of·the ⁼evil

18 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ they·will·¬assemble·themselves house of·Yudah upon °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el and they·will·arrive upon °the °it off of·earth of·north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼countries⁺ upon °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬allotted °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

19 and I* I·told may·be·generated·himself lord ¬that I·will·¬appoint °you to °children⁺ and I·will·give to·you °earth ⁼¬select ⁼law-lot of·God ⁼almighty of·nations⁺ and I·told °father you⁺·will·call °me and off myˊ not you⁺·will·be·¬turned·away

20 ¬but as ¬rejects woman to °the ⁼¬·with to·her thus ¬rejected to °me* house of·Yisra’el says lord

21 voice out of·lips⁺ was·heard of·¬weeping and of·¬petition of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬that they·¬harmed in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·them they·¬forgot·themselves of·God ⁼holy of·them

22 ꜝbe·¬turned⁺ sons⁺ ¬turning and I·will·¬heal·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬ruins⁺ of·you⁺ ¬¡see! servants⁺ we we·will·be·ourselves to·you ¬that you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us you·are

23 ¬really to °lie they·were the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ and the ⁼power of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ¬but through of·lord ⁼God of·us the ⁼salvation of·the ⁼Yisra’el

24 then the ⁼¬shame ¬consumed °the⁺ ⁼¬toils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us off of·youth of·us °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them

25 we·were·bedded in to·the ⁼¬shame of·us and ¬covered °us the ⁼¬dishonour of·us ¬because ¬before of·the ⁼God of·us we·sinned we and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us off of·youth of·us till of·the ⁼day ⁼this and not we·¬obeyed of·the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

4 ifᵮ should·be·¬turned Yisra’el says lord unto °me will·be·¬turned ifᵮ should·be·¬gone·around °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·him out of·mouth of·him and off of·the ⁼face of·me should·be·¬revered

2 and you·will·¬swear·yourself lives lord with of·¬truth and in to·judgment and in to·justice and they·will·¬praise in to·her nations⁺ and in to·him they·will·praise to·the ⁼God in to·Yerushalam

3 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·Yudah and to·the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam ꜝ¬plow·fallow·land⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °¬field·prepared·for·plowings⁺ and ńot you⁺·should·seed upon to·¬thorns⁺

4 ꜝbe·¬circumcised⁺ to·the ⁼God of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬circumcise⁺·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼hardheartedness of·you⁺ men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam ńot should·come·out as fire the ⁼¬wrath of·me and will·be·¬been·enflamed and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬extinguishing off of·face of·evil of·¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

5 ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·the ⁼Yudah and ꜝlet·be·heard in to·Yerushalam you⁺·told ꜝsignify⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth to·trumpet and ꜝcry⁺ °great ꜝtell⁺ ꜝbe·¬assembled⁺ and we·should·come·to to °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼walled⁺

6 ¬taking·up ꜝflee⁺ to °¬Zion ꜝ¬hasten⁺ ńot ꜝstand⁺ ¬that °bad⁺ I* I·¬bring·upon off of·north and °¬breaking ⁼great

7 ascended lion out of·the ⁼¬haven of·him destroying °nations⁺ ¬expelled and came·out out of·the ⁼¬place of·him of·the·one to·put °the ⁼earth to °¬devastation and cities⁺ they·will·be·¬taken·down ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-house·down °them

8 upon to·these⁺ ꜝ¬gird⁺·yourselves⁺ °¬sackcloths⁺ and ꜝchop⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬wail⁺ ¬because not was·¬turned·away the ⁼¬wrath of·lord off of·you⁺

9 and will·be·himself in to·that ⁼the ⁼day says lord will·destroy·himself the ⁼heart of·the ⁼king and the ⁼heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ they·will·¬amaze·themselves and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ they·will·¬marvel·themselves

10 and I·told ¬oh! master ⁼lord ¬therefore ¬indeed ¬tricking you·¬tricked °the ⁼people ⁼this and °the ⁼Yerushalam saying peace will·be·himself to·you⁺ and ¬¡see! touched·himself the ⁼¬sword till of·the ⁼soul of·them

11 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that they·will·¬say to·the ⁼people ⁼this and to·the ⁼Yerushalam breath of·¬delusion in to·the ⁼¬desert path of·the ⁼daughter of·the ⁼people of·me not to °clean not·then to °holy

12 ⁼breath of·¬filling will·arrive to·me now then I* I·speak °judgments⁺ unto °them

13 ¬¡see! as cloud will·ascend·himself and as ¬blast the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him ¬light⁺ of·eagles⁺ the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ of·him ¬woe! to·us ¬that we·¬grieve

14 ꜝ¬wash·off off of·badness °the ⁼heart of·you Yerushalam so·that you·should·be·saved till ¬when? they·will·¬be·already in to·you ¬reasonings⁺ of·evils⁺ of·you

15 ¬because voice of·¬announcing out Dan will·arrive and will·be·heard evil out of·mountain of·¬Ephraim

16 ꜝ¬remind⁺ °nations⁺ ¬¡see! they·arrive ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·Yerushalam ¬commotions⁺ they·come·themselves out of·earth ¬from·afar and they·gave upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah °voice of·them

17 as keeping °field they·were·generated·themselves upon °her ¬surrounding ¬that myˊ you·¬neglected says lord

18 the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you they·did °these⁺ to·you this ⁼the ⁼badness of·you ¬that ¬bitter ¬that touched·himself till of·the ⁼heart of·you

19 °the ⁼belly of·me °the ⁼belly of·me I·¬ache and °the⁺ ⁼¬senses⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·me ¬is·irresistibly·led the ⁼soul of·me ¬convulses·himself the ⁼heart of·me not I·will·¬be·quiet·myself ¬that °voice of·trumpet heard the ⁼soul of·me °cry of·war

20 and °¬misery °¬break ¬calls·himself ¬that has·¬grieved all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬suddenly has·¬grieved the ⁼dwelling they·were·¬torn·apart the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·me

21 till ¬when? I·will·see·myself °fleeing hearing °voice of·trumpets⁺

22 ¬because the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing of·the ⁼people of·me °me* not they·had·¬seen sons⁺ ⁼¬foolish⁺ they·are and not ¬intelligent⁺ ⁼wise⁺ they·are of·the·one to·do·evil °the·one then beautifully to·do not they·¬came·to·know

23 I·¬looked·upon upon °the ⁼earth and ¬¡see! °no·one and to °the ⁼heaven and not was the⁺ ⁼lights⁺ of·him

24 I·saw °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and was ¬trembling and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ ⁼¬troubling

25 I·¬looked·upon and ¬¡see! not was human and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven ¬frightened·himself

26 I·saw and ¬¡see! the Karmēlos ¬desert and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼having·been·¬burned to·fire off of·face of·lord and off of·face of·raging of·¬wrath of·him they·were·¬destroyed

27 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬desert will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth °¬consummation then not ńot I·will·do

28 upon to·these⁺ ꜝlet·¬mourn the ⁼earth and ꜝlet·¬darken the ⁼heaven ¬from·above ¬because I·spoke and not I·will·¬repent I·¬stampeded and not I·will·¬turn·away off of·her

29 off of·voice of·horseman and of·having·been·¬stretched·tight of·¬bow ¬left all ⁼country they·¬entered·into to °the⁺ ⁼caves⁺ and to °the⁺ ⁼¬sacred·groves⁺ they·were·hidden and upon °the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺ they·ascended all ⁼city was·¬left·behind not houses·down in to·them human

30 and you °what you·will·do ifᵮ you·should·¬clothe·yourself °¬scarlet and you·should·cosmos·yourself to·cosmos ⁼gold and ifᵮ you·should·¬rub·on·yourself to·¬antimony °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you to vainly the ⁼¬finery of·you they·¬rejected·themselves °you the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you °the ⁼soul of·you they·seek

31 ¬that °voice as of·¬·in·labor I·heard of·the ⁼¬groan of·you as of·¬giving·birth·first·time voice of·daughter ⁼¬Zion will·be·¬fainted and will·¬neglect °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her ¬alas! I* ¬that ¬fails the ⁼soul of·me upon to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬killed

5 ꜝ¬run·around⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·Yerushalam and ꜝsee⁺ and ꜝknow⁺ and ꜝseek⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼broadway⁺ of·her ifᵮ you⁺·should·find °man if is doing °judgment and seeking °¬trust and calm I·will·be·myself to·them says lord

2 lives lord they·say through °this not upon to·lying⁺ they·¬swear

3 lord the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you to °¬trust you·whipped °them and not they·¬suffered·pain you·¬completed °them and not they·willed to·self-¬receive °¬discipline they·¬strengthened °the⁺ ⁼faces⁺ of·them over °rock and not they·willed to·be·¬turned

4 and I* I·told ¬perhaps poor⁺ they·are ¬because not they·were·had·power ¬that not they·knew °path of·lord and °judgment of·God

5 I·will·go·myself unto °the⁺ ⁼¬stout⁺ and I·will·speak to·them ¬that they they·¬came·to·know °path of·lord and °judgment of·God and ¬¡see! ¬united they·¬broke °yoke they·¬tore °bonds⁺

6 through °this ¬struck °them lion out of·the ⁼¬grove and wolf till of·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ ¬??? °them and leopard ¬kept·watch upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·them all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-going·out off of·them they·will·be·¬hunted ¬that they·multiplied °irreverences⁺ of·them they·were·strong in to·the⁺ ⁼¬rejections⁺ of·them

7 to·¬what? of·these⁺ calm I·should·be·generated·myself to·you the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you they·¬left·behind °me and they·¬swore in to·the·ones⁺ not to·being ⁼Gods⁺ and I·¬feeded °them and they·adulterized·themselves and in to·houses⁺ of·fornicators⁺ they·¬destroyed

8 horses⁺ ⁼¬sex-crazed⁺ they·were·been·generated each upon °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him they·¬announced

9 ńot upon to·these⁺ not I·will·¬visit·myself says lord or in to·nation ⁼¬such·as·this not will·¬avenge the ⁼soul of·me

10 ꜝascend⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼¬battlements⁺ of·her and ꜝ¬ruin⁺ °¬consummation then ńot you⁺·should·do ꜝ¬leave⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬supports⁺ of·her ¬that of·the ⁼lord they·are

11 ¬that ¬rejecting ¬rejected to °me* says lord ⁼house of·Yisra’el and house of·Yudah

12 they·lay·themselves to·the ⁼lord of·¬selves⁺ and they·told not is these⁺ not will·arrive upon °us bad⁺ and °¬sword and °famine not we·will·see·ourselves

13 the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·us they·were to °¬wind and saying of·lord not ¬was·already in to·them thus will·be·himself to·them

14 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼almighty anti of·which⁺ you⁺·spoke °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ¬¡see! I* I·have·given °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me to °the ⁼mouth of·you °fire and °the ⁼people ⁼this °¬woods⁺ and will·¬devour·himself °them

15 ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °you⁺ °nation ¬afar·off house of·Yisra’el says lord °nation of·which not you·will·hear·yourself of·the ⁼voice ⁼the ⁼tongue of·it

16 all⁺ ⁼strong⁺

17 and they·will·¬devour·themselves °the ⁼¬harvest of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ of·you⁺ and they·will·¬devour·themselves °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you⁺ and they·will·¬devour·themselves °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ of·you⁺ and they·will·¬devour·themselves °the⁺ ⁼vineyards⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬fig·groves⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬Olivets⁺ of·you⁺ and they·will·¬thresh °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺ of·you⁺ upon to·which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·have·¬persuaded upon to·them in to·sword

18 and will·be·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you not ńot I·will·do °you⁺ to °¬consummation

19 and will·be·himself ¬when you⁺·should·tell of·what ¬because·of did lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us to·us °¬all⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you·will·¬say to·them anti of·which⁺ you⁺·served to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ in to·the ⁼earth of·you⁺ thus you⁺·will·serve to·¬another's⁺ in to·earth not of·you⁺

20 ꜝ¬announce⁺ °these⁺ to °the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob and ꜝlet·be·heard in to·the ⁼Yudah

21 ꜝhear⁺ ¬so °these⁺ people ⁼¬foolish and ¬heartless eyes⁺ to·them and not they·look·at ears⁺ to·them and not they·hear

22 ńot °me* not you⁺·will·be·afraid says lord or off of·face of·me not you⁺·will·be·¬revered °the ⁼¬appointing °¬sand °region to·the ⁼sea °¬order ⁼eternal and not will·¬wrong·himself °it and will·be·¬troubled and not will·have·power·himself and they·will·¬resound the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ of·her and not will·¬wrong·himself °it

23 then to·the ⁼people ⁼this was·been·generated heart ⁼¬unhearing and ¬disobedient and they·¬turned·from and they·came·off

24 and not they·told in to·the ⁼heart of·them we·should·be·afraid ¬so °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us °the ⁼giving to·us °¬rain ⁼¬early·rain and °¬late·rain ¬by °¬time of·¬filling of·¬order of·¬harvest and kept to·us

25 the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬turned·from °these⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬left °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ off of·you⁺

26 ¬that they·were·found in to·the ⁼people of·me irreverent⁺ and °¬traps⁺ they·stood to·¬destroy °men⁺ and they·¬seized

27 as ¬trap ⁼self-¬approaching ⁼full of·winglings⁺ thus the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them full⁺ of·¬deceit through °this they·were·¬greatened and they·were·enriched

2 and will·be·¬removed the ⁼upwardness of·you daughter of·¬Zion

3 to °her they·will·arrive ¬flocksmans⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ of·them and they·will·¬set·up upon °her °dwellings⁺ ¬surrounding and they·will·¬flocksman each to·the ⁼hand of·him

4 ꜝ¬prepare⁺·yourselves⁺ upon °her to °war ꜝstand·uꝑ⁺ and we·should·ascend upon °her of·midday ¬woe! to·us ¬that has·¬bowed the ⁼day ¬that they·¬fail the⁺ ⁼shadows⁺ of·the ⁼¬evening

7 as ¬cools ¬pit °water thus ¬cools badness of·her irreverence and ¬misery will·be·heard in to·her upon °face of·her through of·all to·evil and to·whip

8 you·will·be·¬instructed Yerushalam ńot should·¬leave the ⁼soul of·me off of·you ńot I·should·do °you °¬impassable ⁼earth who not will·be·housed·down

9 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord you⁺·¬glean·yourselves⁺ you⁺·¬glean·yourselves⁺ as °vine °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·the ⁼Yisra’el ꜝ¬turn⁺ as the ⁼¬harvesting upon °the ⁼¬narrow·basket of·him

10 unto °what I·will·speak and I·should·¬testify·solemnly·myself and will·hear·himself ¬¡see! ¬uncircumcised⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·them and not they·have·power·themselves to·hear ¬¡see! the ⁼¬declaration of·lord was·generated·himself to·them to °¬reproach not ńot they·should·be·¬planed °it to·hear

11 and °the ⁼¬wrath of·me I·filled and I·¬held·fast and not I·¬completed °them I·will·pour·out upon °¬infant⁺ ¬outside and upon °¬synagogue of·youths⁺ ¬together ¬that man and woman they·will·be·¬seized ¬elder with of·full of·days⁺

12 and they·will·be·¬changed the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them to °óther⁺ fields⁺ and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them upon °the °it ¬that I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼earth ⁼this says lord

13 ¬that off of·little of·them and till of·great all⁺ they·¬completed·themselves °¬lawless⁺ off of·priest and till of·¬false·prophet all⁺ they·did °lying⁺

14 and they·¬healed·themselves °the ⁼¬ruin of·the ⁼people of·me ¬rejecting and saying peace ⁼peace and ¬where? is peace

15 they·were·¬dishonored ¬that they·¬failed and not·then as self-¬dishonoring they·were·¬dishonored and °the ⁼¬dishonour of·them not they·knew through °this they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·the ⁼¬fall of·them and in to·¬time of·¬oversight of·them they·will·destroy·themselves told lord

16 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝstand⁺ upon to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ and ꜝsee⁺ and ꜝask⁺ °¬paths⁺ of·lord °eternal⁺ and ꜝsee⁺ ¬what? is the ⁼path ⁼the ⁼good and ꜝ¬proceed⁺ in to·her and you⁺·will·find °purification to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ and they·told not we·will·go·ourselves

18 through °this they·heard the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmaning °the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ of·them

20 so·that °what to·me °incense out Saba you⁺·bear and °cinnamon out of·earth ¬from·afar the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·you⁺ not they·are ¬acceptable⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you⁺ not they·¬were·delicious to·me

21 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·give upon °the ⁼people ⁼this °infirmity and they·will·be·infirm in to·her fathers⁺ and sons⁺ ¬together ¬neighbor and the ⁼¬neighbor of·him they·will·destroy·themselves

22 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! people comes·himself off of·north and nations⁺ will·be·¬raised off of·last of·the ⁼earth

23 °¬bow and °¬pike they·will·take·mightily ¬audacious is and not will·¬have·mercy voice of·him as sea ⁼¬swelling·up upon to·horses⁺ and to·¬chariots⁺ will·¬deploy·himself as fire to °war unto °you daughter of·¬Zion

24 we·heard °the ⁼hearsay of·them they·were·¬paralyzed the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us ¬pressure ¬held·back °us ¬labors⁺ as of·enchilding

25 ńot ꜝgo·out⁺·yourselves⁺ to °field and in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ ńot ꜝ¬proceed⁺ ¬that sword of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ ¬is·a·stranger ¬around

30 °silver ⁼having·self-¬rejected ꜝcall⁺ °them ¬that ¬rejected °them lord

2 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord all ⁼the ⁼Yudaea

3 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ꜝ¬set·right⁺ °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·house·down °you⁺ in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

4 ńot ꜝhave·¬persuaded⁺ upon to·¬selves⁺ upon to·sayings⁺ ⁼lying⁺ ¬that °the·one ¬thoroughly not they·will·¬help °you⁺ saying temple of·lord temple of·lord is

5 ¬that ifᵮ ¬setting·right you⁺·should·¬set·right °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and doing you⁺·should·do °judgment ¬each °middle of·man and ¬each °middle of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him

7 and I·will·house·down °you⁺ in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this in to·earth ⁼which I·gave to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ out of·eternity and till of·eternity

8 if then you⁺ you⁺·have·¬persuaded upon to·sayings⁺ ⁼lying⁺ ¬whence not you⁺·will·be·¬helped

9 and you⁺·murder and you⁺·adulterize·yourselves⁺ and you⁺·thieve and you⁺·¬swear upon to·¬unjust and you⁺·¬burned·incense to·the ⁼Baal and you⁺·went·yourselves⁺ ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ ⁼which⁺ not you⁺·have·¬seen of·the·one bad to·be to·you⁺

11 ńot cave of·¬robbers⁺ the ⁼house of·me ¬whither has·¬called·himself °the ⁼name of·me upon to·him there in·the·eye of·you⁺ and I* ¬¡see! I·have·seen says lord

12 ¬that ꜝbe·gone⁺ to °the ⁼¬place of·me °the·one in Sēlōm ¬whither I·¬dwelt °the ⁼name of·me there ¬before and ꜝsee⁺ °which⁺ I·did to·him off of·face of·badness of·people of·me of·Yisra’el

13 and now anti of·which⁺ you⁺·did °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼these⁺ and I·spoke unto °you⁺ and not you⁺·heard of·me and I·called °you⁺ and not you⁺·were·answered

14 and I·will·do to·the ⁼house ⁼this ⁼which has·¬called·himself the ⁼name of·me upon to·him upon to·which you⁺ you⁺·have·¬persuaded upon to·him and to·the ⁼¬place ⁼which I·gave to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ ¬as I·did to·the Sēlōm

15 and I·will·¬throw·off °you⁺ off of·face of·me ¬as I·¬threw·off °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you⁺ °all ⁼the ⁼seed of·¬Ephraim

16 and you ńot ꜝpray·yourself about of·the ⁼people ⁼this and ńot ꜝ¬deem·worthy·yourself of·the·one to·be·¬had·mercy °them and ńot ꜝpray·yourself and ńot ꜝcome·unto to·me about of·them ¬that not I·will·¬listen·to·myself

17 ¬surely not you·see °what they they·do in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·Yerushalam

18 the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them they·¬collect °¬woods⁺ and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them they·¬kindle °fire and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them ¬??? °¬dough of·the·one to·do °¬cakes⁺ to·the ⁼¬army of·the ⁼heaven and they·libated °libations⁺ to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ so·that they·should·¬anger °me

19 ńot °me* they they·¬anger says lord ¬not! °¬selves⁺ ¬that should·be·¬dishonored °the⁺ ⁼faces⁺ of·them

20 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! raging and ¬wrath of·me pours·himself upon °the ⁼¬place ⁼this and upon °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and upon °all ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼field of·them and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·the ⁼earth and will·be·¬kindled and not will·be·¬extinguished

21 °¬these⁺ says lord °the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ with of·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬eat °meats⁺

22 ¬that not I·spoke unto °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and not I·¬ordered·myself to·them in to·day ⁼which I·¬led °them out of·earth ⁼Egypt about of·¬burnt·offerings⁺ and of·¬sacrifice

23 but or °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this I·¬ordered·myself to·them saying ꜝhear⁺ of·the ⁼voice of·me and I·will·be·myself to·you⁺ to °God and you⁺ you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me to °people and ꜝgo⁺·yourselves⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·me to·which⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you⁺ ¬that iᵮ ¬well should·be to·you⁺

24 and not they·heard of·me and not ¬watched·out °the ⁼ear of·them but they·were·gone in to·the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·them of·the ⁼bad and they·were·been·generated to °the·ones⁺ ¬after and not to °the·ones⁺ ¬before

25 off of·which ⁼day they·came·out the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them out of·earth ⁼Egypt and till of·the ⁼day ⁼this and I·¬sended·out unto °you⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·day and of·¬dawn and I·missioned·off

26 and not they·heard of·me and not ¬watched·out °the ⁼ear of·them and they·hardened °the ⁼neck of·them over °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

27 and you·will·¬say to·them °the ⁼saying ⁼this this ⁼the ⁼nation ⁼which not heard of·the ⁼voice of·lord not·then ¬received·himself °¬discipline ¬failed the ⁼¬trust out of·mouth of·them

29 ꜝ¬shear·yourself °the ⁼head of·you and ꜝ¬throw·off and ꜝ¬take·up upon of·lips⁺ °¬lamentation ¬that ¬rejected lord and ¬rejected·himself °the ⁼generation ⁼the ⁼doing °these⁺

30 ¬that they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yudah °the ⁼evil ¬in·front·of myˊ says lord they·¬appointed °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼house ¬whither has·¬called·himself the ⁼name of·me upon °him of·the·one to·defile °him

31 and they·¬built °the ⁼¬altar of·the Tafeth which is in to·¬valley of·son Ennom of·the·one to·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them in to·fire which not I·¬ordered·myself to·them and not I·was·¬considered in to·the ⁼heart of·me

32 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say still ¬altar of·the Tafeth and ¬valley of·son Ennom but or ¬valley of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬killed and they·will·entomb in to·the Tafeth through °the·one ńot to·¬be·already °¬place

33 and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·the ⁼people ⁼this to °¬eating to·the⁺ ⁼wingling⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬frightening·away

34 and I·will·¬destroy out of·cities⁺ of·Yudah and out of·¬corridors⁺ of·Yerushalam °voice of·self-¬celebrating and °voice of·¬rejoicing °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride ¬that to °¬devastation will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth

8 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that says lord they·will·¬bear °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam out of·the⁺ ⁼tombs⁺ of·them

2 and they·will·¬cool °them unto °the ⁼sun and °the ⁼luna and unto °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ and unto °all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·the ⁼heaven °which⁺ they·loved and to·which⁺ they·served and of·which⁺ they·were·gone ¬after of·them and of·which⁺ they·¬clinged·to·themselves and to·which⁺ they·worshipped to·them not they·will·be·chopped and not they·will·be·entombed and they·will·be·themselves to °¬model upon of·face of·the ⁼earth

3 ¬that they·¬chose·themselves °the ⁼death or °the ⁼life and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬left·behind off of·the ⁼generation ⁼that in to·all ⁼¬place ¬whither ifᵮ I·will·¬expel °them there

4 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ńot the ⁼¬collapsing not stands·uꝑ·himself or the ⁼¬turning·away not ¬turns

5 through °what ¬turned·away the ⁼people of·me this °¬rejection ⁼¬impudent and they·were·¬held·firmly in to·the ⁼¬resolve of·them and not they·willed of·the·one to·¬turn

6 ꜝ¬listen·to⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬so and ꜝhear⁺ not thus they·will·speak not is human ⁼¬repenting off of·the ⁼badness of·him saying °what I·did ¬stopped the ⁼¬running off of·the ⁼¬racecourse of·him as horse ⁼¬sweating in to·¬snorting of·him

7 and the ⁼¬stork in to·the ⁼heaven knew °the ⁼¬time of·her pigeon and ¬swallow of·field ¬sparrows⁺ they·kept °¬times⁺ of·¬entries⁺ of·them then the ⁼people of·me not knew °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ of·lord

8 ¬how?! you⁺·will·¬say ¬that wise⁺ we·are we and law of·lord is with of·us to vainly was·been·generated ¬rush ⁼lying to·writers⁺

9 they·were·¬been·ashamed wise⁺ and they·were·¬frightened and they·¬captured ¬that °the ⁼saying of·lord they·¬rejected wisdom ⁼what is in to·them

10 through °this I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them to·óther⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼fields⁺ of·them to·the⁺ ⁼¬heirs⁺

13 and they·will·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·them says lord not is ¬grape in to·the⁺ ⁼vines⁺ and not is ¬figs⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬fig·trees⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬leafs⁺ has·¬flowed·down

14 upon °what we we·¬sit·ourselves ꜝbe·¬assembled⁺ and we·should·come·to to °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺ and I·should·be·¬thrown·off ¬that the ⁼God ¬threw·off °us and ¬watered °us °water of·¬gall ¬that we·sinned ¬in·front·of of·him

15 we·were·¬assembled to °peace and not was good⁺ to °¬time of·¬healing and ¬¡see! ¬diligence

16 out Dan we·will·hear·ourselves °voice ¬??? of·horses⁺ of·him off of·voice of·¬snorting of·¬riding of·horses⁺ of·him was·¬shaken all ⁼the ⁼earth and will·arrive and will·¬devour·himself °the ⁼earth and °the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her °city and °the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·her

17 ¬because ¬¡see! I* I·¬send·out to °you⁺ °¬snakes⁺ ⁼putting·to·death to·which⁺ not is to·¬charm and they·will·¬bite·themselves °you⁺

18 ¬incurable⁺ with of·¬anguish ⁼heart of·you⁺ of·¬been·perplexed

19 ¬¡see! voice of·cry ⁼daughter of·people of·me off of·earth ¬from·afar ńot lord not is in to·¬Zion or king not is there through °what they·¬angered °me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ of·them and in to·vain⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺

20 ¬passed·through ¬summer ¬passed·by ¬harvest and we not we·were·¬saved

21 upon to·¬ruin of·daughter of·people of·me I·was·¬darkened to·¬perplexity they·¬prevailed °me ¬labors⁺ as of·enchilding

22 ńot ¬balm not is in Galaad or ¬physician not is there through °what not ascended ¬healing of·daughter of·people of·me

23 what will·give to·head of·me °water and to·eyes⁺ of·me °¬flow of·¬teardrops⁺ and I·will·¬weep·myself °the ⁼people of·me °this of·day and of·night °the⁺ ⁼having·self-traumatized of·daughter of·people of·me

9 what may·give to·me in to·the ⁼¬desert °¬doorpost ⁼last and I·will·¬leave·behind °the ⁼people of·me and I·will·come·off·myself off of·them ¬that all⁺ they·adulterize·themselves ¬convocation of·¬rejecting

2 and they·¬stretched·tight °the ⁼tongue of·them as °¬bow lie and not ¬trust ¬strengthened upon of·the ⁼earth ¬that out of·bad⁺ to °bad⁺ they·came·out and °me* not they·knew

3 each off of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ꜝkeep⁺·yourselves⁺ and upon to·brothers⁺ of·them ńot ꜝhave·¬persuaded⁺ ¬that all ⁼brother to·heel will·heel and all ⁼friend ¬deceitfully will·go·himself

4 each ¬by of·the ⁼friend of·him will·¬mock °¬truth not ńot they·should·speak has·studied the ⁼tongue of·them to·speak °lying⁺ they·¬harmed and not they·¬stopped of·the·one to·¬turn

5 ¬interest upon to·¬interest ¬deceit upon to·¬deceit not they·willed to·have·¬seen °me

6 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬burn °them and I·will·¬test °them ¬that I·will·do off of·face of·evil ⁼daughter of·people of·me

8 ńot upon to·these⁺ not I·will·¬visit·myself says lord or in to·people ⁼the ⁼¬such·as·this not will·¬avenge the ⁼soul of·me

9 upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ꜝtake⁺ °¬lamentation and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ of·the ⁼¬desert °¬lamentation ¬that they·¬failed ¬from °the·one ńot to·be °humans⁺ not they·heard °voice of·¬property off of·winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and till of·¬animals⁺ they·¬amazed they·¬were·undone·themselves

16 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝcall⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬lamenting and ꜝlet·them·come⁺ and unto °the⁺ ⁼wise⁺ ꜝmission·off⁺ and ꜝlet·them·¬speak⁺·themselves

21 and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ to °¬model upon of·face ⁼the ⁼¬plain of·the ⁼earth of·you⁺ and as ¬grass ¬after of·¬reaping and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬assembling

10 ꜝhear⁺ °the ⁼saying of·lord °which spoke upon °you⁺ house of·Yisra’el

2 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬by °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ńot ꜝstudy⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ of·the ⁼heaven ńot ꜝfear⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬that they·fear·themselves they to·the⁺ ⁼faces⁺ of·them

3 ¬that the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ vain⁺ ¬wood is out of·the ⁼¬grove having·self-¬prevented ⁼work of·¬craftsman and ¬molten·casting

4 to·silver and to·gold having·self-¬bedecked is in to·¬adzes⁺ and to·¬nails⁺ they·¬strengthened °them and not they·will·be·¬moved

9 silver ⁼¬turned is not they·will·go·themselves silver ⁼¬amalgamated off Tharsis will·arrive gold ¬??? and hand ⁼¬goldsmith works⁺ of·¬craftsmans⁺ all⁺ °hyacinth and °purple they·will·¬put·on °them

11 thus you⁺·will·¬say to·them Gods⁺ ⁼which⁺ °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth not they·did ꜝlet·them·destroy⁺·themselves off of·the ⁼earth and ¬from·beneath of·the ⁼heaven ⁼this

11 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah saying

16 °¬olive·tree ⁼¬Beautiful ⁼¬well-shaded to·the ⁼¬appearance called lord °the ⁼name of·you to °voice of·¬circumcision of·her was·¬set·fire °fire upon °her great ⁼the ⁼¬pressure upon °you they·were·¬made·worthless the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺ of·her

17 and lord ⁼the ⁼¬planting °you spoke upon °you °bad⁺ anti of·the ⁼badness of·house ⁼Yisra’el and of·house ⁼Yudah ¬that they·did to·¬selves⁺ of·the·one to·¬anger °me in to·the·one to·¬burn·incense °them to·the ⁼Baal

18 lord ꜝmake·known to·me and I·will·know·myself ŧhen I·saw °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·them

19 I* then as °lamb ⁼¬innocent ⁼self-bringing of·the·one to·self-¬sacrifice not I·knew upon °me* they·¬counted·themselves °¬thought ⁼evil saying ¬come and we·should·throw·in °¬wood to °the ⁼bread of·him and we·should·¬obliterate °him off of·earth of·living and the ⁼name of·him not ńot should·be·memoried still

20 lord judging °just⁺ ¬testing °kidneys⁺ and °hearts⁺ may·I·see °the·one ¬from of·you °¬vengeance out of·them ¬that unto °you I·¬revealed °the ⁼just·deed of·me

21 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ Anathōth °the⁺ ⁼seeking °the ⁼soul of·me °the⁺ ⁼saying not ńot you·should·¬prophesy upon to·the ⁼name of·lord if then ńot you·will·die·off·yourself in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us

22 ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬visit·myself upon °them the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ of·them in to·¬sword they·will·die·off·themselves and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them they·will·¬decease in to·famine

12 just you·are lord ¬that I·will·¬defend·oneself·myself unto °you ¬but °judgments⁺ I·will·speak unto °you °what ¬that path of·irreverent⁺ ¬gets·along·well·himself they·¬prospered all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rejecting °¬disregardings⁺

2 you·¬planted °them and they·rooted they·¬produced·children and they·did °fruit ¬near you·are you of·the ⁼mouth of·them and ¬far off of·the⁺ ⁼kidneys⁺ of·them

3 and you lord you·know °me you·have·¬tested °the ⁼heart of·me ¬in·front·of of·you ꜝpurify °them to °day of·¬slaughter of·them

4 till ¬when? will·¬mourn the ⁼earth and all ⁼the ⁼¬grass of·the ⁼field will·be·dried·up off of·badness of·the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·her they·were·¬destroyed ¬animals⁺ and winglings⁺ ¬that they·told not will·see·himself the ⁼God °paths⁺ of·us

5 of·you the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ they·¬run and they·¬faint °you ¬how?! should·¬prepare upon to·horses⁺ and in to·earth of·peace you you·have·¬persuaded ¬how?! you·will·do in to·¬neighing of·the ⁼¬Jordan

6 ¬that and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you and the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·you and these⁺ they·¬rejected °you and they they·shouted out of·the·ones⁺ ¬after of·you they·were·¬gathered ńot you·should·trust in to·them ¬that they·will·speak unto °you °beautiful⁺

7 I·have·¬left·behind °the ⁼house of·me I·¬released °the ⁼law-lot of·me I·gave °the ⁼having·self-loved ⁼soul of·me to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·her

8 was·been·generated the ⁼law-lot of·me to·me* as lion in to·¬grove gave upon °me* °the ⁼voice of·her through °this I·¬hated °her

9 ńot cave hyena the ⁼law-lot of·me to·me* or cave ¬surrounding of·her ꜝ¬proceed⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field and ꜝlet·them·come⁺ of·the·one to·¬eat °her

10 ¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ they·¬destroyed °the ⁼vineyard of·me they·¬defiled °the ⁼part of·me they·gave °part ⁼¬one·who·desires of·me to °¬desert ⁼¬impassable

11 was·put to °¬disappearance of·destruction through °me* to·¬disappearance was·¬destroyed all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬that not is man ⁼self-putting in to·heart

12 upon °all ⁼¬mountain·pass in to·the ⁼¬desert they·came ¬grieving ¬that ¬sword of·the ⁼lord will·¬devour·himself off of·¬end of·the ⁼earth till of·¬end of·the ⁼earth not is peace to·all ⁼flesh

13 ꜝseed⁺ °¬wheats⁺ and °¬thorns⁺ ꜝ¬reap⁺ the⁺ ⁼lots⁺ of·them not they·will·¬help °them ꜝbe·¬been·ashamed⁺ off of·¬pride of·you⁺ off of·¬reproach ¬before of·lord

14 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬neighbors⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼law-lot of·me of·which I·parted to·the ⁼people of·me to·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·¬draw·away °them off of·the ⁼earth of·them and °the ⁼Yudah I·will·throw·out out of·middle of·them

15 and will·be·himself with °the·one to·be·going·to·throw·out °me °them I·will·¬turn and I·will·¬have·mercy °them and I·will·house·down °them °each to °the ⁼law-lot of·him and °each to °the ⁼earth of·him

16 and will·be·himself ifᵮ studying they·should·study °the ⁼path of·the ⁼people of·me of·the·one to·¬swear to·the ⁼name of·me lives lord ¬as they·taught °the ⁼people of·me to·¬swear to·the ⁼Baal and they·will·be·¬built in to·middle of·the ⁼people of·me

17 ifᵮ then ńot they·should·¬turn and I·will·¬expel °the ⁼nation ⁼that to·¬departure and to·destruction

13 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝ¬possess·yourself to·yourself °¬loincloth ⁼linen and ꜝ¬put·on·yourself about °the ⁼¬loins of·you and in to·water not will·¬pass·through·himself

2 and I·¬possessed·myself °the ⁼¬loincloth ¬by °the ⁼saying of·lord and I·¬put·on about °the ⁼¬loins of·me

3 and was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °me saying

4 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬loincloth ⁼the·one about °the ⁼¬loins of·you and ꜝstand·uꝑ and ꜝ¬proceed upon °the ⁼¬Euphrates and ꜝ¬hide °it there in to·the ⁼¬hole of·the ⁼rock

5 and I·was·gone and I·hid °it in to·the ⁼¬Euphrates ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·me lord

6 and was·generated·himself with °days⁺ ⁼many⁺ and told lord unto °me ꜝstand·uꝑ ꜝ¬proceed upon °the ⁼¬Euphrates and ꜝtake ¬from·there °the ⁼¬loincloth ⁼which I·¬ordered·myself to·you of·the·one to·¬hide there

7 and I·was·gone upon °the ⁼¬Euphrates ⁼¬river and I·¬dug and I·took °the ⁼¬loincloth out of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither I·¬buried °it there and ¬¡see! having·self-¬destroyed was which not ńot should·be·¬lended to °no·one

9 °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬destroy °the ⁼¬mistreatment of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬mistreatment of·Yerushalam

11 ¬that ¬just·as ¬joins·himself the ⁼¬loincloth about °the ⁼¬loins of·the ⁼human thus I·¬joined unto °myself °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el and °all ⁼house of·Yudah of·the·one to·self-be·generated to·me to °people ⁼¬famous and to °¬pride and to °glory and not they·¬listened·to of·me

13 and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! 21 °what you·will·¬say ¬when they·should·¬visit·themselves °you and you you·taught °them upon °you °¬lessons⁺ to °¬beginning not ¬labors⁺ they·will·¬hold·back °you ¬as °woman ⁼enchilding

25 this ⁼the ⁼lot of·you and part of·the·one to·¬disobey °you⁺ to·me* says lord as you·¬forgot·yourself of·me and you·hoped upon to·lying⁺

26 and I* I·will·¬reveal °the·ones⁺ ¬after of·you upon °the ⁼face of·you and will·be·seen the ⁼¬dishonour of·you

14 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah about of·the ⁼¬drought

2 ¬mourned the ⁼Yudaea and the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·her they·were·emptied and they·were·¬darkened upon of·the ⁼earth and the ⁼cry of·the ⁼Yerushalam ascended

3 and the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ of·her they·missioned·off °the⁺ ⁼young⁺ of·them upon °water they·came upon °the⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ and not they·found °water and they·¬turned·away °the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·them °empty⁺

4 and the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬failed ¬that not was ¬rain they·were·¬been·ashamed ¬farmers⁺ they·¬covered °the ⁼head of·them

5 and ¬hinds⁺ in to·field they·enchilded and they·¬left·behind ¬that not was ¬crop

6 donkeys⁺ ⁼of·the·field⁺ they·stood upon °¬groves⁺ they·¬drew °¬wind they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·them ¬that not was ¬grass off of·people of·¬unrighteousness

7 if the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us they·¬opposed to·us lord ꜝdo to·us ¬because·of of·you ¬that many⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us ¬in·front·of of·you ¬that to·you we·sinned

8 ¬perseverance of·Yisra’el lord and you·save in to·¬time of·bad⁺ so·that °what you·were·been·generated ¬like ¬foreigner upon of·the ⁼earth and as ¬native-born ⁼¬turning·from to °¬guest·room

9 ńot you·will·be·yourself ¬just·as human ⁼sleeping or as man not self-having·power to·save and you in to·us you·are lord and the ⁼name of·you has·¬called·himself upon °us ńot should·¬forget of·us

10 thus says lord to·the ⁼people ⁼this they·loved to·¬move °feet⁺ of·them and not they·¬spared·themselves and the ⁼God not ¬delighted in to·them now will·be·memoried of·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them

11 and told lord unto °me ńot ꜝpray·yourself about of·the ⁼people ⁼this to °good⁺

12 ¬that ifᵮ they·should·fast not I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·the ⁼¬petition of·them and ifᵮ they·should·¬bear·near °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifices⁺ not I·will·¬delight in to·them ¬that in to·¬sword and in to·famine and in to·death I* I·will·¬complete °them

13 and I·told ¬oh! lord ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them they·¬prophesy and they·say not you⁺·will·see·yourselves⁺ °¬sword not·then famine will·be·himself in to·you⁺ ¬that °¬truth and °peace I·will·give upon of·the ⁼earth and in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

14 and told lord unto °me °lying⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ they·¬prophesy upon to·the ⁼name of·me not I·missioned·off °them and not I·¬ordered·myself to·them and not I·spoke unto °them ¬that °sights⁺ ⁼lying⁺ and °¬divinations⁺ and °¬omens⁺ and °¬resolves⁺ of·heart of·them they they·¬prophesy to·you⁺

15 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord about of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying upon to·the ⁼name of·me °lying⁺ and I* not I·missioned·off °them which⁺ they·say ¬sword and famine not will·be·himself upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼this in to·death ⁼¬diseased they·will·die·off·themselves and in to·famine they·will·be·¬completed the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺

16 and the ⁼people to·which⁺ they they·¬prophesy to·them and they·will·be·themselves having·been·¬thrown in to·the⁺ ⁼¬corridors⁺ of·Yerushalam off of·face °¬swords⁺ and of·the ⁼famine and not will·be·himself the ⁼entombing °them and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them and I·will·pour·out upon °them °the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·them

18 ifᵮ I·should·come·out to °the ⁼¬plain and ¬¡see! trauma-deads⁺ of·¬sword and ifᵮ I·should·come·to to °the ⁼city and ¬¡see! evil of·famine ¬that priest and ¬prophet they·were·gone to °earth ⁼which not they·had·¬seen

22 ńot is in to·idols⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ¬raining and if the ⁼heaven will·give °¬gratification of·him ¬not! you you·are he and we·will·¬remain °you ¬that you you·did °all⁺ ⁼these⁺

15 and told lord unto °me ifᵮ should·stand Mosheh and ¬Samuel ¬before of·face of·me not is the ⁼soul of·me unto °them ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people ⁼this and ꜝlet·them·come·out⁺

2 and will·be·himself ifᵮ they·should·tell unto °you ¬where? we·will·come·out·ourselves and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord whatever⁺ to °death to °death and whatever⁺ to °¬sword to °¬sword and whatever⁺ to °famine to °famine and whatever⁺ to °battlechained to °battlechained

3 and I·will·¬avenge upon °them °four⁺ ⁼¬appearances⁺ says lord °the ⁼¬sword to °¬slaughter and °the⁺ ⁼dogs⁺ to °¬tearing·in·pieces and °the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and °the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven to °¬eating and to °¬decay

4 and I·will·¬deliver °them to °¬necessities⁺ to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ of·the ⁼earth through °¬Manasseh ⁼son of·¬Hezekiah °king of·Yudah about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ did in to·Yerushalam

5 what will·¬spare·himself upon to·you Yerushalam and what will·¬be·timid upon to·you or what will·¬return to °peace to·you

6 you you·were·¬turned·away °me says lord ¬after you·should·go·yourself and I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me and I·will·¬destroy °you and ¬not·any·more I·will·¬loosen °them

7 and I·will·¬scatter °them in to·¬dispersion in to·gates⁺ of·people of·me they·were·¬been·barren they·destroyed °the ⁼people of·me through °the⁺ ⁼badnesses⁺ of·them

8 they·were·multiplied widows⁺ of·them over °the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼sea they·¬brought·upon upon °mother of·youth °¬misery in to·midday I·¬threw·on upon °her ¬suddenly °¬trembling and °¬diligence

10 ¬alas! I* mother as °what⁺ °me you·enchilded °man ⁼self-¬acting·as·judge and °self-¬judging to·all ⁼the ⁼earth not·also I·¬helped not·also ¬helped °me no·one the ⁼strength of·me ¬failed in to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬cursing °me

15 lord ꜝbe·memoried of·me and ꜝ¬visit·yourself °me and ꜝ¬acquit °me off of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °me ńot to °¬patience ꜝknow as I·took about of·you °¬reproach

16 ¬by of·the⁺ ⁼¬rejecting °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you ꜝ¬complete °them and will·be·himself the ⁼saying of·you to·me* to °¬joy and °¬joy of·heart of·me ¬that has·¬called·himself the ⁼name of·you upon to·me* lord almighty

19 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ifᵮ you·should·¬turn and I·should·¬restore °you and ¬before of·face of·me you·will·stand·yourself and ifᵮ you·should·bring·out °¬precious off of·¬unworthy as mouth of·me you·will·be·yourself and they·will·¬live they unto °you and you not you·will·¬live unto °them

16 and you ńot you·should·take °woman says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el

2 and not will·be·engendered to·you son not·then daughter in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

3 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord about of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and about of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼engendered in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and about of·the⁺ ⁼mothers⁺ of·them of·the⁺ ⁼having·enchilded °them and about of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·engendered °them in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this

4 in to·death ⁼¬diseased they·will·die·off·themselves not they·will·be·chopped and not they·will·be·entombed to °¬model upon of·face of·the ⁼earth they·will·be·themselves and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and to·the⁺ ⁼wingling⁺ of·the ⁼heaven in to·¬sword they·will·¬collapse·themselves and in to·famine they·will·be·¬completed

5 °¬these⁺ says lord ńot you·should·come·to to °¬revelry of·them and ńot you·should·be·gone of·the·one to·self-chop and ńot you·should·¬mourn °them ¬that I·have·¬left °the ⁼peace of·me off of·the ⁼people ⁼this

6 not ńot they·should·chop·themselves °them not·then °¬cuts⁺ not ńot they·should·do and not they·will·shave·themselves
