9 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·¬destroy out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this in·the·eye of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you⁺ °voice of·¬joy and °voice of·¬joy °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride

10 and will·be·himself ¬when you·should·¬announce to·the ⁼people ⁼this °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ and they·should·tell unto °you through °what spoke lord upon °us °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼these⁺ what ⁼the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·us and what ⁼the ⁼sin of·us °which we·sinned ¬before of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

11 and you·will·¬say to·them anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °me the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ says lord and they·¬were·undone·themselves ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ and they·served to·them and they·worshipped to·them and °me* they·¬left·behind and °the ⁼law of·me not they·kept·themselves

12 and you⁺ you⁺·¬acted·wickedly·yourselves⁺ over °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and ¬¡see! you⁺ you⁺·go·yourselves⁺ each ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬pleasing⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·you⁺ of·the ⁼evil of·the·one ńot to·¬obey of·me

13 and I·will·¬throw·off °you⁺ off of·the ⁼earth ⁼this to °the ⁼earth ⁼which not you⁺·had·¬seen you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·serve there to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ which⁺ not they·will·give to·you⁺ °mercy

14 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say still lives lord ⁼the ⁼¬leading °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

15 but lives lord ⁼which ¬led °the ⁼house of·Yisra’el off of·earth of·north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼countries⁺ ¬whither they·were·¬expelled there and I·will·¬restore °them to °the ⁼earth of·them °which I·gave to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

16 ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off °the⁺ ⁼¬fishermans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼many⁺ says lord and they·will·¬fish °them and with °these⁺ I·will·mission·off °the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼¬hunters⁺ and they·will·¬hunt °them ¬above of·all ⁼mountain and ¬above of·all ⁼¬hill and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬holes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺

17 ¬that the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·them and not was·hidden the⁺ ⁼¬crimes⁺ of·them ¬opposite of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me

18 and I·will·¬repay °¬double⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them upon to·which⁺ they·¬profaned °the ⁼earth of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬decaying·flesh⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them in to·which⁺ they·¬offended °the ⁼law-lot of·me

19 lord strength of·me and ¬help of·me and ¬refuge of·me in to·day of·bad⁺ unto °you nations⁺ they·will·arrive off of·last of·the ⁼earth and they·will·¬say as °lying⁺ they·¬possessed·themselves the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us °idols⁺ and not is in to·them ¬benefit

20 if will·do to·himself human °Gods⁺ and these⁺ not they·are Gods⁺

21 through °this ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬make·clear to·them in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼this °the ⁼hand of·me and I·will·make·known to·them °the ⁼power of·me and they·will·know·themselves ¬that name to·me lord

5 ⁼¬cursed ⁼the ⁼human ⁼which °the ⁼hope has upon °human and will·¬establish °flesh of·arm of·him upon °him and off of·lord should·¬leave the ⁼heart of·him

6 and will·be·himself as the ⁼¬tamarisk ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬desert not will·see·himself ¬when should·come the⁺ ⁼good⁺ and will·¬dwell in to·¬salty·land⁺ and in to·¬desert in to·earth ⁼¬brackish who not is·housed·down

7 and having·self-¬praised ⁼the ⁼human ⁼which has·¬persuaded upon to·the ⁼lord and will·be·himself lord hope of·him

8 and will·be·himself as ¬wood ⁼¬prospering ¬from °waters⁺ and upon °¬moisture will·throw °roots⁺ of·him and not will·be·afraid ¬when should·come ¬heat and will·be·himself upon to·him °¬sticks⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ in to·¬year of·¬drought not will·be·afraid and not will·¬stop doing °fruit

9 ¬deep ⁼the ⁼heart ¬from °all⁺ and human is and what will·know·himself °him

10 I* lord ⁼¬chastising °hearts⁺ and ¬testing °kidneys⁺ of·the·one to·give to·each ¬by °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·him and ¬by °the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·him

11 ¬called ¬partridge ¬assembled °which⁺ not enchilded doing °riches of·him not with of·judgment in to·half of·days⁺ of·him they·will·¬leave·behind °him and upon of·last⁺ of·him will·be·himself ¬foolish

12 ⁼throne of·glory self-upping holiness of·us

13 ¬perseverance of·Yisra’el lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬leaving·behind °you ꜝlet·them·be·¬dishonored⁺ having·¬left upon of·the ⁼earth ꜝlet·them·be·written⁺ ¬that they·¬left·behind °¬flow of·life °the ⁼lord

14 ꜝ¬heal·yourself °me lord and I·will·be·¬healed ꜝsave °me and I·will·be·saved ¬that ¬pride of·me you you·are

15 ¬¡see! they they·say unto °me ¬where? is the ⁼saying of·lord ꜝlet·come

16 I* then not I·¬labored ¬following ¬after of·you and °day of·human not I·¬longed·for you you·should·¬know·yourself the⁺ ⁼self-going·out through of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·me ¬before of·face of·you is

17 ńot you·should·be·been·generated to·me to °¬alienation self-¬sparing of·me in to·day ⁼evil

18 ꜝlet·them·be·¬dishonored⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬pursuing °me and ńot may·I·be·¬dishonored I* may·they·be·¬frightened they and ńot may·I·be·¬frightened I* ꜝ¬bring·upon upon °them °day ⁼evil °¬double ⁼¬ruin ꜝ¬break °them

19 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝstand in to·gates⁺ of·sons⁺ of·people of·you in to·which⁺ they·¬enter·themselves in to·them kings⁺ of·Yudah and in to·which⁺ they·go·out·themselves in to·them and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam

20 and you·will·¬say unto °them ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord kings⁺ of·Yudah and all ⁼Yudaea and all ⁼Yerushalam the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺

21 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝkeep⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ and ńot ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °¬burdens⁺ in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and ńot ꜝgo·out⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam

22 and ńot ꜝ¬bear⁺ °¬burdens⁺ out of·houses⁺ of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and °all ⁼work not you⁺·will·do ꜝmake·holy⁺ °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ ¬as I·¬ordered·myself to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and not they·heard and not they·¬bowed °the ⁼ear of·them

23 and they·hardened °the ⁼neck of·them over °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them of·the·one ńot to·hear of·me and of·the·one ńot to·self-¬receive °¬discipline

24 and will·be·himself ifᵮ to·hearsay you⁺·should·hear of·me says lord of·the·one ńot to·¬bear·in °¬burdens⁺ through of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and to·make·holy °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·the·one ńot to·do °all ⁼work

25 and they·will·come·to·themselves through of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this kings⁺ and ¬rulers⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and having·¬mounted upon to·¬chariots⁺ and to·horses⁺ of·them they and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam and will·be·housed·down the ⁼city ⁼this to °the ⁼eternity

26 and they·will·arrive out of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬around of·Yerushalam and out of·earth of·¬Benjamin and out of·the ⁼¬level and out of·the ⁼mountain and out of·the·one unto °south bearing °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifice and °¬incenses⁺ and °¬gift and °incense bearing °praise to °house of·lord

27 and will·be·himself ifᵮ ńot you⁺·should·¬listen·to of·me of·the·one to·make·holy °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·the·one ńot to·¬take·up °¬burdens⁺ and ńot to·self-¬enter to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and I·will·¬set·fire °fire in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·her and will·¬devour·himself °¬streets⁺ of·Yerushalam and not will·be·¬extinguished

18 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah saying

2 ꜝstand·uꝑ and ꜝdescend to °house of·the ⁼potter and there you·will·hear·yourself °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

3 and I·descended to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼potter and ¬¡see! he did °work upon of·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺

4 and ¬failed °the ⁼¬jar which he did in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him and ¬again he did °it ⁼¬jar ⁼óther ¬as ¬pleased in·the·eye of·him of·the·one to·do

5 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

6 if ¬as the ⁼potter ⁼this not I·will·have·power·myself of·the·one to·do °you⁺ house of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! as the ⁼¬clay of·the ⁼potter you⁺ you⁺·are in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me

7 ¬end I·will·speak upon °nation or upon °kingdom of·the·one to·¬expel °them and of·the·one to·destroy

8 and should·be·¬turned the ⁼nation ⁼that off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·them and I·will·¬repent about of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬counted·myself of·the·one to·do to·them

9 and ¬end I·will·speak upon °nation and upon °kingdom of·the·one to·self-¬rebuild and of·the·one to·self-¬plant

10 and they·should·do °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ¬in·front·of of·me of·the·one ńot to·hear of·the ⁼voice of·me and I·will·¬repent about of·the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke of·the·one to·do to·them

11 and now ꜝtell unto °men⁺ of·Yudah and unto °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam ¬¡see! I* I·¬mold upon °you⁺ °bad⁺ and I·¬count·myself upon °you⁺ °¬thought ꜝlet·be·¬turned·away ¬so each off of·path of·him of·the ⁼evil and °beautiful⁺ you⁺·will·do °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

12 and they·told we·will·¬act·like·a·man·ourselves ¬that ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬rejections⁺ of·us we·will·go·ourselves and each °the⁺ ⁼¬pleasing⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·him of·the ⁼evil we·will·do

13 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝask⁺ ¬so in to·nations⁺ what heard °¬such·as·this⁺ ⁼¬cause·for·shuddering⁺ ⁼which⁺ did very virgin of·Yisra’el

14 ńot they·will·¬fail off of·rock ¬breasts⁺ or ¬snow off of·the Libanou ńot will·¬turn·from water ¬forcibly to·¬wind self-bearing

15 ¬that they·¬forgot·themselves of·me the ⁼people of·me to °empty they·¬burned·incense and they·will·be·infirm in to·the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·them ¬??? °eternal⁺ of·the·one to·be·¬mounted °¬paths⁺ not °having °path to °¬journey

16 of·the·one to·¬appoint °the ⁼earth of·them to °¬disappearance and °¬hissing ⁼eternal all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬going·through through of·her they·will·¬amaze·themselves and they·will·¬move °the ⁼head of·them

17 as °¬wind ⁼¬heat I·will·¬scatter °them ¬by °face of·¬enemies⁺ of·them I·will·¬show to·them °day of·destruction of·them

18 and they·told ¬come we·should·¬count·ourselves upon °¬Jeremiah ⁼¬thought ¬that not will·destroy·himself law off of·priest and ¬plan off of·¬intelligent and saying off of·¬prophet ¬come and we·should·¬strike °him in to·tongue and we·will·hear·ourselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him

19 ꜝ¬listen·to of·me lord and ꜝ¬listen·to of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼just·deed of·me

20 if ¬repays·himself anti of·good⁺ bad⁺ ¬that they·¬talked·with °¬declarations⁺ ¬by of·the ⁼soul of·me and °the ⁼¬punishment of·them they·hid to·me ꜝbe·memoried of·having·stood of·me ¬by °face of·you of·the·one to·speak over of·them °good⁺ of·the·one to·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬wrath of·you off of·them

21 through °this ꜝgive °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them to °famine and ꜝ¬gather °them to °hands⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ ꜝlet·them·be·generated⁺·themselves the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them ¬childless⁺ and widows⁺ and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·them ꜝlet·them·be·generated⁺·themselves having·self-¬killed to·death and the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ of·them having·¬collapsed to·¬sword in to·war

22 ꜝlet·be·been·generated cry in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them you·will·¬bring·upon upon °them ⁼¬robbers⁺ ¬suddenly ¬that they·¬took·in·hand °saying to ¬??? of·me and °¬traps⁺ they·hid upon °me*

23 and you lord you·knew °¬all ⁼the ⁼¬plan of·them upon °me* to °death ńot you·should·¬acquit °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them off of·face of·you ńot you·should·¬blot·out ꜝlet·be·generated·himself the ⁼infirmity of·them ¬in·front·of of·you in to·¬time of·¬wrath of·you ꜝdo in to·them

19 ŧhen told lord unto °me ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝ¬possess·yourself °¬pitcher ⁼having·self-¬molded ⁼¬clay and you·will·bring off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·the ⁼people and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼priests⁺

2 and you·will·come·out·yourself to °the ⁼¬cemetery of·sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·them which is upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ of·gate ⁼the·one ¬??? and ꜝ¬read there °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ iᵮ I·will·speak unto °you

3 and you·will·¬say to·them ꜝhear⁺ °the ⁼saying of·lord kings⁺ of·Yudah and men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam and the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺ °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼¬place ⁼this °bad⁺ ¬so of·all ⁼hearing °them will·¬resound ¬both⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·him

4 anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °me and they·¬alienated °the ⁼¬place ⁼this and they·¬burned·incense in to·him to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·had·¬seen they and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah they·filled °the ⁼¬place ⁼this of·bloods⁺ ⁼¬innocent⁺

5 and they·¬built °upward⁺ to·the ⁼Baal of·the·one to·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them in to·fire °which⁺ not I·¬ordered·myself not·then I·spoke not·then I·was·¬considered in to·the ⁼heart of·me

6 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not will·be·called to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this still ¬downfall and ¬cemetery of·son Ennom but or ¬cemetery of·the ⁼¬slaughter

7 and I·will·¬slaughter °the ⁼¬plan of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬plan of·Yerushalam in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and I·will·¬lay °them in to·¬sword ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them and in to·hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼seeking °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·them to °¬eating to·the⁺ ⁼wingling⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth

8 and I·will·¬appoint °the ⁼city ⁼this to °¬disappearance and to °¬hissing all ⁼the ⁼self-¬passing·by upon of·her will·¬look·downcast and will·¬hiss over of·all ⁼the ⁼¬plague of·her

9 and they·will·¬eat·themselves °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them and each °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him they·will·¬eat·themselves in to·the ⁼¬passage and in to·the ⁼¬assault ⁼which they·will·¬assault °them the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them

10 and you·will·¬break °the ⁼¬pitcher ¬by °eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-going·out with of·you

11 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬break °the ⁼people ⁼this and °the ⁼city ⁼this ¬as ¬breaks·himself °¬vessel °¬clay which not will·have·power·himself to·be·¬healed still

12 thus I·will·do says lord to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and to·the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·him of·the·one to·be·given °the ⁼city ⁼this as °the ⁼¬failing

13 and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·Yerushalam and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·kings⁺ of·Yudah they·will·be·themselves ¬as the ⁼¬place ⁼the ⁼¬failing of·the⁺ ⁼¬impurities⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ in to·which⁺ they·¬burned·incense upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬rooftops⁺ of·them to·all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·the ⁼heaven and they·libated °libations⁺ to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺

14 and came ¬Jeremiah off of·the ⁼¬downfall ¬whither missioned·off °him lord there of·the·one to·¬prophesy and stood in to·the ⁼¬palace of·house ⁼lord and ꜝtell unto °all ⁼the ⁼people

15 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼city ⁼this and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·her and upon °the⁺ ⁼towns⁺ of·her °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke upon °her ¬that they·hardened °the ⁼neck of·them of·the·one ńot to·¬listen·to of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

20 and heard Paschōr ⁼son Emmēr the ⁼priest and this was having·self-¬appointed ⁼self-¬governing of·house ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼¬Jeremiah ⁼¬prophesying °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

2 and ¬struck °him and threw·in °him to °the ⁼¬dungeon which was in to·gate of·house ⁼having·self-¬left of·the ⁼¬upper·room which was in to·house of·lord

3 and brought·out Paschōr °the ⁼¬Jeremiah out of·the ⁼¬dungeon and told to·him ¬Jeremiah ¬not! Paschōr called lord °the ⁼name of·you but or °¬refugee

4 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·give °you to °¬displacement wiŧh to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼friend⁺ of·you and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·¬sword of·¬enemies⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you they·will·see·themselves and °you and °all ⁼Yudah I·will·give to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and they·will·¬deport °them and they·will·¬cut °them in to·¬swords⁺

5 and I·will·give °the ⁼all ⁼strength of·the ⁼city ⁼this and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·the ⁼king ⁼Yudah to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·him and they·will·bring °them to °¬Babylon

6 and you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·the ⁼house of·you you⁺·will·go·yourselves⁺ in to·battlechained and in to·¬Babylon you·will·die·off·yourself and there you·will·entomb·yourself you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼friend⁺ of·you to·which⁺ you·¬prophesied to·them °lying⁺

7 you·¬tricked °me lord and I·was·¬tricked you·took·mightily and you·were·had·power I·was·generated·myself to °¬laughter °all ⁼day I·¬continued ¬mocked

8 ¬that to·¬bitter ⁼saying of·me I·will·¬laugh·myself °¬rebellion and °¬misery I·will·¬call·myself ¬that was·been·generated saying of·lord to °¬reproach to·me* and to °¬taunting °all ⁼day of·me

9 and I·told not ńot I·will·name °the ⁼name of·lord and not ńot I·will·speak still upon to·the ⁼name of·him and was·generated·himself as fire ⁼self-¬kindling ⁼¬blazing in to·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me and I·have·¬neglected·myself ¬from·all·sides and not I·have·power·myself to·bear

10 ¬that I·heard °¬fault of·many⁺ ⁼self-¬assembling ¬around ꜝ¬rise·up·together·against⁺ and we·should·¬rise·up·together·against to·him all⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼friend⁺ of·him ꜝ¬keep⁺ °the ⁼¬thought of·him if will·be·¬tricked and we·will·have·power·ourselves to·him and we·will·take·ourselves °the ⁼¬vengeance of·us out of·him

11 and lord with myˊ ¬as ¬warrior of·strengths⁺ through °this they·¬pursued and to·¬understand not they·had·power·themselves they·were·¬been·ashamed very ¬that not they·¬understanded °¬dishonours⁺ of·them which⁺ through of·eternity not they·will·be·¬forgotten

12 lord ¬testing °just⁺ ¬understanding °kidneys⁺ and °hearts⁺ may·I·see °the·one ¬from of·you °¬vengeance in to·them ¬that unto °you I·¬revealed °the⁺ ⁼¬pleas⁺ of·me

13 ꜝsing⁺ to·the ⁼lord ꜝpraise⁺ to·him ¬that ¬took·out·himself °soul of·¬poor out of·hand of·self-¬acting·wickedly

14 ¬cursed ⁼the ⁼day in to·which I·was·enchilded in to·her the ⁼day in to·which enchilded °me the ⁼mother of·me ńot ꜝlet·be ¬longed·for

15 ¬cursed ⁼the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼self-¬announcing to·the ⁼father of·me saying was·enchilded to·you ¬male self-¬celebrating

16 ꜝlet·be the ⁼human ⁼that as the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ °which⁺ turned·down lord in to·¬wrath and not was·¬repented ꜝlet·hear of·cry °the·one early and of·¬shout of·midday

17 ¬that not killed·off °me in to·motherhood of·mother and was·generated·himself to·me the ⁼mother of·me tomb of·me and the ⁼motherhood ¬??? of·eternal

18 so·that °what ⁼this they·came·out out of·motherhood of·the·one to·look·at °¬labors⁺ and °evils⁺ and they·¬continued in to·¬shame the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me

21 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah when missioned·off unto °him the ⁼king Sedekias °the Paschōr ⁼son Melchiou and Sofonian ⁼son Maasaiou °the ⁼priest saying

2 ꜝ¬ask about of·us °the ⁼lord ¬that king of·¬Babylon has·¬approached upon °us if will·do lord ¬by °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelous⁺ of·him and will·come·off·himself off of·us

3 and told unto °them ¬Jeremiah thus you⁺·will·¬say unto Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah

4 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬change °the⁺ ⁼¬armors⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warfare⁺ in to·which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·war in to·them unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬confined °you⁺ ¬outside of·the ⁼wall to °the ⁼middle of·the ⁼city ⁼this

5 and I·will·war I* °you⁺ in to·hand ⁼having·self-¬stretched·out and in to·arm ⁼mighty with of·¬wrath and of·raging and of·¬anger ⁼great

6 and I·will·¬strike °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·the ⁼city ⁼this °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ in to·death ⁼great and they·will·die·off·themselves

7 and with °these⁺ thus says lord I·will·give °the Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·him and °the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼¬left·behind in to·the ⁼city ⁼this off of·the ⁼death and off of·the ⁼famine and off of·the ⁼¬sword to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼seeking °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and they·will·¬cut °them in to·mouth of·¬sword not I·will·¬spare·myself upon to·them and not ńot I·will·¬have·compassion °them

8 and unto °the ⁼people ⁼this you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·have·given ¬before of·face of·you⁺ °the ⁼path of·the ⁼life and °the ⁼path of·the ⁼death

9 the ⁼self-¬sitting in to·the ⁼city ⁼this will·die·off·himself in to·¬sword and in to·famine and the ⁼self-going·out to·¬join·with unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬confined °you⁺ will·live·himself and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·him to °¬plunders⁺ and will·live·himself

10 ¬because I·have·¬established °the ⁼face of·me upon °the ⁼city ⁼this to °bad⁺ and not to °good⁺ to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon will·be·¬delivered and will·¬burn °her in to·fire

11 the ⁼house of·king ⁼Yudah ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord

12 house of·David °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝjudge⁺ °the·one early °judgment and ꜝ¬guide⁺ and ꜝ¬take·out⁺·yourselves⁺ °self-¬robbing out of·hand of·¬harming °him ¬that ńot should·be·¬set·fire as fire the ⁼raging of·me and will·be·¬kindled and not will·be·himself the ⁼going·to·¬extinguish

13 ¬¡see! I* unto °you °the ⁼housing·down °the ⁼¬cavity of·¬Tyre °the ⁼¬level °the⁺ ⁼saying what will·¬frighten °us or what will·come·to·himself unto °the ⁼housing-down of·us

14 and I·will·¬set·fire °fire in to·the ⁼¬grove of·her and will·¬eat·himself °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her

22 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝgo·yourself and ꜝdescend to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼king ⁼Yudah and you·will·speak there °the ⁼saying ⁼this

2 and you·will·¬say ꜝhear °saying of·lord king of·Yudah the ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David you and the ⁼house of·you and the ⁼people of·you and the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺

3 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝdo⁺ °judgment and °justice and you⁺·¬take·out·yourselves⁺ °¬robbed out of·hand of·¬harming °him and °¬proselyte and °orphan and °widow ńot ꜝ¬oppress⁺ and ńot ꜝbe·irreverent⁺ and °blood ⁼¬innocent ńot you⁺·should·pour·out in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

4 ¬because ifᵮ doing you⁺·should·do °the ⁼saying ⁼this and they·will·come·to·themselves in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼this kings⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and having·¬mounted upon of·¬chariots⁺ and of·horses⁺ they and the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·them and the ⁼people of·them

5 ifᵮ then ńot you⁺·should·do °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬by of·myself I·¬swore says lord ¬that to °¬devastation will·be·himself the ⁼house ⁼this

6 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ¬by of·the ⁼house ⁼king ⁼Yudah Galaad you to·me ¬beginning of·the Libanou ifᵮ ńot I·should·put °you to °¬desert °cities⁺ ńot °having·been·housed·down

7 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °you °man ⁼destroying and °the ⁼¬hewing·axe of·him and they·will·¬prevent °the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ ⁼¬Kidrons⁺ of·you and they·will·throw·in to °the ⁼fire

8 and they·will·¬pass·through·themselves nations⁺ through of·the ⁼city ⁼this and they·will·¬say each unto °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him through °what did lord thus to·the ⁼city ⁼the ⁼great ⁼this

9 and they·will·¬say anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °the ⁼¬covenant of·lord ⁼God of·them and they·worshipped to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ and they·served to·them

10 ńot ꜝ¬weep⁺ °the ⁼having·died ńot·then ꜝ¬lament⁺ °him ꜝ¬weep⁺ to·¬weeping °the ⁼self-going·out ¬that not will·¬turn still and not ńot should·see °the ⁼earth of·fatherland of·him

11 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord upon Sellēm ⁼son of·¬Josiah °the ⁼becoming·king anti of·¬Josiah ⁼the ⁼father of·him which came·out out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this not will·¬live there ¬not·any·more

12 but or in to·the ⁼¬place ¬whither I·¬deported °him there will·die·off·himself and °the ⁼earth ⁼this not will·see·himself still

13 ¬oh! the ⁼¬building °house of·him not with of·justice and °the⁺ ⁼¬upper·rooms⁺ of·him not in to·judgment ¬from to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him works·himself °¬free·gift and °the ⁼¬wage of·him not ńot will·¬pay to·him

14 you·¬built to·yourself °house ⁼¬well-proportioned °¬upper·rooms⁺ ⁼¬ventilated⁺ ⁼having·been·¬given·orders to·¬windows⁺ and °having·been·¬boarded in to·¬Kidron and °having·been·christened in to·¬vermilion

15 ńot you·should·become·king ¬that you you·¬provoke·yourself in to·¬Ahaz to·the ⁼father of·you not they·will·¬eat·themselves and not they·will·drink·themselves ¬better was °you to·do °judgment and °justice ⁼beautiful

16 not they·knew not they·judged °judgment to·¬lowly not·then °judgment of·¬poor not this is the·one ńot to·know °you °me* says lord

17 ¬¡see! not they·are the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you not·then the ⁼heart of·you beautiful but to °the ⁼¬muchhaveness of·you and to °the ⁼blood ⁼the ⁼¬innocent of·the·one to·pour·out °it and to °¬crime and to °murder of·the·one to·do

18 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon Iōakim ⁼son of·¬Josiah °king of·Yudah ¬woe! upon °the ⁼man ⁼this not ńot they·should·chop·themselves °him ¬oh! brother not·then ńot they·will·¬weep·themselves °him ¬alas! lord

19 °tomb of·donkey will·be·entombed ¬scraped·away will·be·¬thrown ¬beyond of·the ⁼gate ⁼Yerushalam

20 ꜝascend to °the ⁼incense and ꜝhave·cried and to °the Basan ꜝgive °the ⁼voice of·you and ꜝshout to °the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼sea ¬that they·were·¬broken all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you

21 I·spoke unto °you in to·the ⁼¬transgression of·you and you·told not I·will·hear·myself this ⁼the ⁼path of·you out of·youth of·you not you·heard of·the ⁼voice of·me

22 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·you will·¬flocksman ¬wind and the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you in to·battlechained they·will·come·out·themselves ¬that ŧhen you·will·be·¬been·ashamed and you·will·be·¬disgraced off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬befriending °you

23 housing·down in to·the ⁼incense ¬nesting in to·the⁺ ⁼¬Kidrons⁺ you·will·¬groan in to·the·one to·come to·you of·¬labor as of·enchilding

24 I·live I* says lord ifᵮ self-generated should·be·generated·himself ¬Jechoniah ⁼son Iōakim king of·Yudah ¬seal upon of·the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼¬right of·me ¬from·there I·will·¬pull·out °you

25 and I·will·¬deliver °you to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼seeking °the ⁼soul of·you of·which⁺ you you·¬revere·yourself off of·face of·them to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺

26 and I·will·¬throw·off °you and °the ⁼mother of·you °the ⁼enchilding °you to °earth ¬whither not you·were·enchilded there and there you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

27 to then °the ⁼earth ⁼which they they·pray·themselves to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them not ńot they·should·¬turn·away

28 was·¬disgraced ¬Jechoniah as ¬vessel of·which not is need of·him ¬that was·¬cast·forth and was·thrown·out to °earth ⁼which not had·¬seen

29 earth ⁼earth ꜝhear °saying of·lord

30 ꜝwrite °the ⁼man ⁼this ⁼¬banished ⁼human ¬that not ńot should·be·¬grown out of·the ⁼seed of·him man ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David ¬·first still in to·the ⁼Yudah

23 ¬oh! the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬scattering and destroying °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼¬pasture of·me

2 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon °the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmaning °the ⁼people of·me you⁺ you⁺·¬scattered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·me and ꜝ¬expel⁺ °them and not you⁺·¬visited·yourselves⁺ °them ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬avenge upon °you⁺ ¬by °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

3 and I* I·will·¬receive·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·the ⁼people of·me off of·all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬whither I·¬expelled °them there and I·will·¬appoint °them to °the ⁼¬pasture of·them and they·will·be·¬grown and they·will·be·multiplied

4 and I·will·stand·uꝑ to·them °¬flocksmans⁺ which⁺ they·will·¬flocksman °them and not they·will·be·afraid still not·then they·will·be·¬frightened says lord

5 ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and I·will·stand·uꝑ to·the ⁼David °¬east ⁼just and will·become·king king and will·¬understand and will·do °judgment and °justice upon of·the ⁼earth

6 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him will·be·saved Yudah and Yisra’el will·¬dwell having·¬persuaded and this ⁼the ⁼name of·him which will·call °him lord Iōsedek

9 in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ was·¬broken the ⁼heart of·me in to·me* was·¬shaken all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me I·was·been·generated as man ⁼having·self-¬broken and as human ⁼self-¬holding off of·wine off of·face of·lord and off of·face of·¬beauty ⁼glory of·him

10 ¬that off of·face of·these⁺ ¬mourned the ⁼earth they·were·dried·up the⁺ ⁼¬pastures⁺ of·the ⁼¬desert and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬racecourse of·them evil and the ⁼strength of·them not thus

11 ¬that priest and ¬prophet they·were·¬defiled and in to·the ⁼house of·me I·saw °evils⁺ of·them

12 through °this ꜝlet·be·generated·himself the ⁼path of·them to·them to °¬slip in to·¬darkness and they·will·be·¬tripped·up and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·her ¬because I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °bad⁺ in to·¬year of·¬review of·them ¬asserts lord

13 and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬Samaria I·saw °¬violation·of·laws⁺ they·¬prophesied through of·the ⁼Baal and they·¬led·astray °the ⁼people of·me °Yisra’el

14 and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·Yerushalam I·have·seen °¬cause·for·shuddering⁺ °self-adulterizing and °self-going in to·lying⁺ and °self-¬helping of·hands⁺ of·evil⁺ of·the·one ńot to·be·¬turned·away °each off of·the ⁼path of·him of·the ⁼evil they·were·been·generated to·me all⁺ as ¬Sodom and the⁺ ⁼housing·down °her ¬just·as ¬Gomorrah

15 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬feed °them °¬anguish and I·will·¬water °them °water ⁼¬bitter ¬that off of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·Yerushalam came·out ¬defilement to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

16 thus says lord ⁼almighty ńot ꜝhear⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ¬that they·¬make·futile to·¬selves⁺ °sight off of·heart of·them they·speak and not off of·mouth of·lord

17 they·say to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬rejecting °the ⁼saying of·lord peace will·be·himself to·you⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-going to·the⁺ ⁼wills⁺ of·them to·all ⁼the ⁼self-going to·¬error of·heart of·him they·told not will·arrive upon °you bad⁺

18 ¬that what stood in to·¬garrison of·lord and saw °the ⁼saying of·him what ¬listened·to·himself and heard

19 ¬¡see! ¬earthquake ¬from of·lord and raging goes·out·himself to °¬quaking self-¬gathering upon °the⁺ ⁼irreverent⁺ will·arrive

20 and ¬not·any·more will·¬turn·away the ⁼¬wrath of·lord till iᵮ should·do °it and till iᵮ should·stand·uꝑ °it off of·¬enterprise of·heart of·him upon of·last of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ they·will·¬understand °them

21 not I·missioned·off °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ and they they·¬ran not I·spoke unto °them and they they·¬prophesied

22 and if they·stood in to·the ⁼¬confidence of·me and they·¬listened·to of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me and °the ⁼people of·me iᵮ they·¬turned·away °them off of·the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·them

23 God ⁼¬coming·near I* I·am says lord and ¬not! God ¬afar·off

24 if will·be·hidden human in to·¬hidden⁺ and I* not I·will·see·myself °him ńot ¬not! °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth I* I·will·fulfill says lord

25 I·heard °which⁺ they·speak the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ °which⁺ they·¬prophesy upon to·the ⁼name of·me °lying⁺ saying I·¬sleepdreamed·myself °¬sleepdream

26 till ¬when? will·be·himself in to·heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying °lying⁺ and in to·the·one to·¬prophesy °them °the⁺ ⁼wills⁺ of·heart of·them

27 ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬counting of·the·one to·self-¬forget of·the ⁼law of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬sleepdreams⁺ of·them °which⁺ they·¬related·fully·themselves each to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ¬just·as they·¬forgot·themselves the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them of·the ⁼name of·me in to·the ⁼Baal

28 the ⁼¬prophet in to·which the ⁼¬sleepdream is ꜝlet·¬relate·fully·himself °the ⁼¬sleepdream of·him and in to·which the ⁼saying of·me unto °him ꜝlet·¬relate·fully·himself °the ⁼saying of·me upon of·¬truth °what ⁼the ⁼¬chaff unto °the ⁼¬grain thus the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me says lord

29 ¬not! the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me ¬just·as fire ⁼¬blazing says lord and as ¬hewing·axe ⁼chopping °rock

30 through °this ¬¡see! I* unto °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼thieving ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me each ¬from of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him

32 ¬¡see! 33 and ifᵮ they·should·ask °you the ⁼people ⁼this or priest or ¬prophet ⁼saying what ⁼the ⁼¬concern of·lord and you·will·¬say to·them you⁺ you⁺·are the ⁼¬concern and I·will·¬dash·down °you⁺ says lord

34 and the ⁼¬prophet and the ⁼priest and the ⁼people which⁺ iᵮ they·should·tell ¬concern of·lord and I·will·¬avenge °the ⁼human ⁼that and °the ⁼house of·him

38 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God anti of·which⁺ you⁺·told °the ⁼saying ⁼this ¬concern of·lord and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ saying not you⁺·will·¬say ¬concern of·lord

40 and I·will·give upon °you⁺ °¬reproach ⁼eternal and °¬dishonour ⁼eternal who not will·be·¬forgotten

7 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say still lives lord ⁼which ¬led °the ⁼house of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

8 but lives lord ⁼which ¬assembled °¬all ⁼the ⁼seed of·Yisra’el off of·earth of·north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼countries⁺ ¬whither ¬expelled °them there and ¬restored °them to °the ⁼earth of·them

24 ¬showed to·me lord two °¬reed·baskets⁺ of·¬fig·trees⁺ °self-¬laying ¬by °face of·temple ⁼lord with °the·one to·¬exile Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon °the ⁼¬Jechoniah ⁼son Iōakim °king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬craftsmans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼bondmen⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼rich⁺ out of·Yerushalam and brought °them to °¬Babylon

2 the ⁼¬reed·basket ⁼the ⁼one of·¬fig·trees⁺ ⁼¬good⁺ very as the⁺ ⁼¬fig⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬early·rain⁺ and the ⁼¬reed·basket ⁼the ⁼óther of·¬fig·trees⁺ ⁼evil⁺ very which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·evil of·them

3 and told lord unto °me °what you you·see ¬Jeremiah and I·told °¬figs⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬good⁺ ⁼¬good⁺ ¬greatly and the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ¬greatly which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·evil of·them

4 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

5 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el as °the⁺ ⁼¬figs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬good⁺ ⁼these⁺ thus I·will·¬come·to·know·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬exiled of·Yudah °which⁺ I·have·¬sended·out out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this to °earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ to °good⁺

6 and I·will·¬establish °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me upon °them to °good⁺ and I·will·¬restore °them to °the ⁼earth ⁼this to °good⁺ and I·will·¬rebuild °them and not ńot I·should·¬take·down and I·will·¬plant °them and not ńot I·¬pluck·out

7 and I·will·give to·them °heart of·the·one to·have·¬seen °them °me* ¬that I* I·am lord and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·them to °God ¬that they·will·be·¬turned upon °me* out of·the ⁼whole ⁼heart of·them

8 and as °the⁺ ⁼¬figs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·evil of·them °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬deliver °the Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ of·him and °the ⁼¬remaining of·Yerushalam °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬left in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this and °the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·Egypt

9 and I·will·give °them to °¬exile to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ of·the ⁼earth and they·will·be·themselves to °¬reproach and to °¬parable and to °¬hatred and to °¬curse in to·all ⁼¬place ¬whither I·¬expelled °them there

10 and I·will·mission·off to °them °the ⁼famine and °the ⁼death and °the ⁼¬sword till iᵮ they·should·¬fail off of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·them

25 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah upon °all ⁼the ⁼people of·Yudah in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼fourth of·the Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah

2 °which spoke unto °all ⁼the ⁼people of·Yudah and unto °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam saying

3 in to·¬thirteenth ⁼year of·¬Josiah ⁼son ⁼¬Amos ⁼king ⁼Yudah and till of·the ⁼day ⁼this twenty and °three⁺ ⁼years⁺ and I·spoke unto °you⁺ ¬rising·at·dawn and saying

4 and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬dawn missioning·off and not you⁺·¬listened·to and not you⁺·¬watched·out to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you⁺

5 saying ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ each off of·the ⁼path of·him of·the ⁼evil and off of·the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·house·down upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ off of·eternity and till of·eternity

6 ńot you⁺·should·go·yourselves⁺ ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ of·the·one to·serve to·them and of·the·one to·worship to·them ¬that ńot you⁺·should·¬anger °me in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ of·the·one to·do·bad °you⁺

7 and not you⁺·heard of·me

8 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬since not you⁺·trusted to·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

9 ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off and I·will·take·myself °the ⁼paternity off of·north and I·will·bring °them upon °the ⁼earth ⁼this and upon °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °her and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her and I·will·¬make·desolate °them and I·will·give °them to °¬disappearance and to °¬hissing and to °¬reproach ⁼eternal

10 and I·will·destroy off of·them °voice of·¬joy and °voice of·¬joy °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride °smell of·myrrh and °light of·¬lamp

11 and will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth to °¬disappearance and they·will·serve in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ seventy °years⁺

12 and in to·the·one to·be·fulfilled °the·ones⁺ seventy °years⁺ I·will·¬avenge °the ⁼nation ⁼that ¬asserts lord and I·will·put·myself °them to °¬disappearance ⁼eternal

13 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼earth ⁼that °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me °which⁺ I·spoke ¬by of·her °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-written in to·the ⁼booklet ⁼this

14 °which⁺ ¬prophesied ¬Jeremiah upon °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Elamites⁺

15 ⁼¬these⁺ says lord ꜝlet·be·¬broken °the ⁼¬bow of·¬Elamite ¬beginning of·¬command of·them

16 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °¬Elamite °four⁺ ⁼¬winds⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬end⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and I·will·¬scatter °them in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬winds⁺ ⁼these⁺ and not will·be·himself °nation which not will·arrive there the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬expelled of·¬Elamite

17 and I·will·¬frighten °them ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼seeking °the ⁼soul of·them and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °bad⁺ ¬by °the ⁼raging of·the ⁼¬wrath of·me and I·will·¬send·as·successor ¬after of·them °the ⁼¬sword of·me till of·the·one to·¬consume °them

18 and I·will·put °the ⁼throne of·me in to·¬Elamite and I·will·¬send·out ¬from·there °king and °¬great·mans⁺

19 and will·be·himself upon of·last of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼battlechained of·¬Elamite says lord

20 in to·¬beginning of·becoming·king Sedekiou ⁼the ⁼king was·generated·himself the ⁼saying ⁼this about °¬Elamite

2 to·the ⁼Egypt upon °power of·Pharaoh Nechaō ⁼king of·Egypt which was upon to·the ⁼¬river ⁼¬Euphrates in ¬??? °which ¬struck Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon in to·the ⁼year to·the ⁼fourth Iōakim ⁼king ⁼Yudah

3 ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °¬armors⁺ and °asps⁺ and ꜝ¬bring·near⁺ to °war

4 ꜝ¬saddle⁺ °the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ ꜝbe·¬mounted⁺ the⁺ ⁼horsemen⁺ and ꜝ¬appoint⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬helmets⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝ¬put·forth⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬wooden·spears⁺ and ꜝ¬put·on⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬breastplates⁺ of·you⁺

5 °what ¬that they they·¬frighten·themselves and they·¬leave ¬after ¬because the⁺ ⁼strong⁺ of·them they·will·be·chopped to·fleeing they·fled and not they·¬lived self-¬containing ¬around says lord

6 ńot ꜝlet·flee the ⁼¬light and ńot ꜝlet·¬escape·himself the ⁼strong upon °north °the·ones⁺ ¬from °the ⁼¬Euphrates they·were·infirm they·have·¬collapsed

7 what ⁼this as ¬river will·ascend·himself and as ¬rivers⁺ they·¬swell·up °water

8 °waters⁺ of·Egypt ¬like ¬river will·ascend·himself and told I·will·ascend·myself and I·will·¬cover °earth and I·will·destroy °housing·down in to·her

9 ꜝbe·¬mounted⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ ꜝ¬prepare⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ ꜝcome·out⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬warriors⁺ of·Ethiopians⁺ and Libues having·self-¬armed·fully to·¬armors⁺ and ¬Lydias⁺ ꜝascend⁺ ꜝ¬stretch·tight⁺ °¬bow

10 and the ⁼day ⁼that to·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us day of·¬vengeance of·the·one to·¬avenge °the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·him and will·¬devour·himself the ⁼¬sword of·lord and will·be·¬filled·up and will·be·¬gotten·drunk off of·the ⁼blood of·them ¬that ¬sacrifice to·the ⁼lord of·tzeba’ots⁺ off of·earth of·north upon to·¬river ⁼¬Euphrates

11 ꜝascend Galaad and ꜝtake °¬balm to·the ⁼virgin ⁼daughter of·Egypt to °empty you·multiplied °¬healings⁺ of·you ¬advantage not is to·you

20 ¬heifer ⁼having·self-¬bedecked ⁼Egypt ¬broken·branch off of·north came upon °her

27 saying of·lord °which spoke upon °¬Babylon

33 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord houses⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon as ¬threshing-floor ¬in·season they·will·be·¬threshed still °little and will·arrive the ⁼¬harvest of·her

34 ¬devoured °me parted·himself °me ¬grasped °me °¬vessel ⁼¬coin Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon ¬swallowed °me as dragon filled °the ⁼belly of·him off of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence of·me ¬expelled °me

36 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·judge °the ⁼¬opponent of·you and I·will·¬avenge °the ⁼¬vengeance of·you and I·will·¬lay·waste °the ⁼sea of·her and I·will·dry·up °the ⁼¬flow of·her

39 in to·the ⁼¬heat of·them I·will·give °¬drink to·them and I·will·¬get·drunk °them ¬that ¬??? and they·should·sleep °sleep ⁼eternal and not ńot they·should·be·¬arisen says lord

40 I·will·¬bring·down °them as °lambs⁺ to °¬slaughter and as °¬rams⁺ with of·¬goats⁺

41 ¬how?! ¬captured and was·¬hunted °the ⁼¬pride of·all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬how?! was·generated·himself ¬Babylon to °¬disappearance in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

42 ascended upon °¬Babylon the ⁼sea in to·¬sound of·¬waves⁺ of·her and was·¬covered

43 they·were·been·generated the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·her earth ⁼¬waterless and ¬impassable not will·house·down in to·her not·then one not·then ńot you·will·¬destroy·yourself in to·her son of·human

44 and I·will·¬avenge upon °¬Babylon and I·will·¬bear °which⁺ ¬swallowed out of·the ⁼mouth of·her and not ńot they·should·be·¬assembled unto °her still °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

49 and in to·¬Babylon they·will·¬collapse·themselves trauma-deads⁺ of·all ⁼the ⁼earth

50 self-¬escaping out of·earth you⁺·go·yourselves⁺ and ńot ꜝstand⁺·yourselves⁺ the·ones⁺ ¬from·afar ꜝbe·memoried⁺ of·the ⁼lord and Yerushalam ꜝlet·ascend upon °the ⁼heart of·you⁺

51 we·were·¬been·ashamed ¬that we·heard °¬reproach of·us ¬covered ¬dishonour °the ⁼face of·us they·came·to ¬foreign⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·us to °house of·lord

52 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and I·will·¬avenge upon °the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ of·her and in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth of·her they·will·¬collapse·themselves trauma-deads⁺

53 ¬that ifᵮ should·ascend ¬Babylon as the ⁼heaven and ¬that ifᵮ should·¬fortify °upwardness of·strength of·her ¬from myˊ they·will·arrive destroying °her says lord

54 voice of·cry in to·¬Babylon and ¬breaking ⁼great in to·earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺

55 ¬that destroyed lord °the ⁼¬Babylon and destroyed off of·her °voice ⁼great ⁼¬resounding as °waters⁺ ⁼many⁺ gave to °destruction °voice of·her

56 ¬that came upon °¬Babylon ¬misery they·¬captured the⁺ ⁼¬warriors⁺ of·her has·been·¬frightened °the ⁼¬bow of·them ¬that God ¬repays to·them lord ¬repays to·her °the ⁼¬reward

57 and will·¬get·drunk to·¬drunkenness °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼wise⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬officers⁺ of·her says the ⁼king ⁼lord ⁼almighty name to·him

58 °¬these⁺ says lord wall of·¬Babylon was·broadened ¬ruined will·be·¬ruined and the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·her the⁺ ⁼upward⁺ they·will·be·¬burned and not they·will·¬labor peoples⁺ to °empty and nations⁺ in to·¬beginning they·will·¬fail

29 upon °the⁺ ⁼othertribes⁺

2 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! waters⁺ ascends off of·north and will·be·himself to °¬brook ¬flooding and will·¬flood °earth and °the ⁼¬fulfillment of·her °city and °the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·her and they·will·cry·themselves the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and they·will·¬wail ¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down °the ⁼earth

3 off of·voice ⁼¬impulse of·him off of·the⁺ ⁼¬armors⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him and off of·¬earthquake of·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him ⁼¬sound of·¬courses⁺ of·him not they·¬turned fathers⁺ upon °sons⁺ of·them off of·¬feebleness of·hands⁺ of·them

38 ¬left·behind ¬just·as lion °¬guest·room of·him ¬that was·been·generated the ⁼earth of·them to °¬impassable off of·face of·the ⁼¬sword ⁼the ⁼great

33 in to·¬beginning of·king Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah was·been·generated the ⁼saying ⁼this ¬from of·lord

2 thus told lord ꜝstand in to·¬palace of·house ⁼lord and you·will·¬announce to·¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-coming to·worship in to·house of·lord °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬directed to·you to·them to·¬announce ńot you·should·¬remove °¬declaration
