7 ¬that thus told lord to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ꜝbe·¬celebrated⁺ and ꜝ¬snort⁺ upon °head of·nations⁺ °¬audible⁺ ꜝdo⁺ and ꜝpraise⁺ you⁺·told saved lord °the ⁼people of·him °the ⁼¬remaining of·the ⁼Yisra’el

8 ¬¡see! I* I·bring °them off of·north and I·will·¬assemble °them off of·last of·the ⁼earth in to·feast of·¬passover and ¬??? °crowd ⁼much and they·will·¬turn·away ¬here

9 in to·¬weeping they·came·out and in to·¬encouragement I·will·¬lead °them ¬spending·the·night upon °¬aqueducts⁺ of·waters⁺ in to·path ⁼¬upright and not ńot they·should·be·¬led·astray in to·her ¬that I·was·generated·myself to·the ⁼Yisra’el to °father and ¬Ephraim ⁼¬firstborn of·me is

10 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord nations⁺ and ꜝ¬announce⁺ to °islands⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ °¬long you⁺·told the ⁼¬crushing °the ⁼Yisra’el will·¬assemble °him and will·keep °him as the ⁼¬feeding °the ⁼¬flock of·him

11 ¬that ¬ransomed·himself lord °the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬took·out·himself °him out of·hand of·¬strong⁺ of·him

12 and they·will·arrive and they·will·be·¬celebrated in to·the ⁼mountain of·¬Zion and they·will·arrive upon °good⁺ of·lord upon °earth of·¬grain and of·wine and of·fruits⁺ and of·¬animals⁺ and of·sheep⁺ and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·them ¬just·as °¬wood ¬containing·fruit and not they·will·hunger still

13 ŧhen they·will·be·¬rejoiced virgins⁺ in to·¬synagogue of·youths⁺ and ¬old·mans⁺ they·will·be·¬rejoiced and I·will·turn °the ⁼¬grief of·them to °¬cause·for·joy and I·will·do °them ⁼self-¬celebrating

14 I·will·¬greaten and I·will·¬get·drunk °the ⁼soul of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Levi and the ⁼people of·me of·the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·me will·be·¬filled·up

15 thus told lord voice in to·¬Ramah was·heard of·¬lamentation and of·¬weeping and of·¬mourning ¬Rachel ⁼self-¬weeping not willed to·self-rest upon to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·her ¬that not they·are

16 thus told lord ꜝlet·¬stop the ⁼voice of·you off of·¬weeping and the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you off of·¬teardrops⁺ of·you ¬that is ¬wage to·the·ones⁺ yourˊ to·works⁺ and they·will·¬turn out of·earth of·¬enemies⁺

17 ¬??? to·the·ones⁺ yourˊ to·children⁺

18 °hearsay I·heard to·¬Ephraim of·self-¬grieving you·¬instructed °me and I·was·¬instructed I* ¬just·as calf not I·was·taught °going·to·¬turn °me and I·will·¬turn ¬that you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·me

19 ¬that ¬later of·battlechained of·me I·¬repented and ¬later of·the·one to·know °me I·¬groaned upon of·day ⁼¬shame and I·¬showed to·you ¬that they·took °¬reproach out of·youth of·me

20 son ⁼beloved ⁼¬Ephraim to·me* °kid ¬revelling ¬that anti of·which⁺ the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me in to·him to·memory I·will·be·memoried of·him through °this I·¬hastened upon to·him ¬having·mercy I·will·¬have·mercy °him ¬asserts lord

21 ꜝstand °yourself ¬Zion ꜝdo °¬punishment ꜝgive °heart of·you to °the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ °path ⁼which you·were·gone ꜝbe·¬turned·away virgin of·Yisra’el ꜝbe·¬turned·away to °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·you ¬mourning

22 till ¬when? you·will·¬turn·away daughter ⁼having·been·¬disgraced ¬that ¬created lord °salvation to °¬planting ⁼new in to·salvation they·will·¬go·around·themselves humans⁺

23 thus told lord still they·will·¬say °the ⁼saying ⁼this in to·earth of·Yudah and in to·cities⁺ of·him ¬when I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼battlechained of·him having·self-¬praised ⁼lord upon °just °mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·him

24 and ¬dwelling·in in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth of·him ¬together to·¬farmer and will·be·¬taken·up in to·¬flock

25 ¬that I·¬got·drunk °all ⁼soul ⁼thirsting and °all ⁼soul ⁼hungering I·¬filled·up

26 through °this I·was·¬raised and they·saw and the ⁼sleep of·me ¬agreeable to·me was·been·generated

27 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves ¬asserts lord and I·will·seed °the ⁼Yisra’el and °the ⁼Yudah °seed of·human and °seed of·¬animal

28 and will·be·himself ¬just·as I·¬kept·watch upon °them to·¬take·down and to·do·bad thus I·will·¬keep·watch upon °them of·the·one to·¬build and to·¬plant ¬asserts lord

29 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ not ńot they·should·tell the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ they·¬ate °¬unripe·grape and the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼children⁺ they·¬had·tooth-chills

30 but or each in to·the·one of·himself to·sin will·die·off·himself and of·the ⁼¬eating °the·one °¬unripe·grape they·will·¬have·tooth-chills the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·him

31 ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves ¬asserts lord and I·will·¬make·a·covenant·myself to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el and to·the ⁼house of·Yudah °¬covenant ⁼new

32 not ¬by °the ⁼¬covenant ⁼which I·¬made·a·covenant·myself to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them in to·day of·self-¬catching of·me of·the ⁼hand of·them to·bring·out °them out of·earth ⁼Egypt ¬that they not they·¬abided·in in to·the ⁼¬covenant of·me and I* I·¬neglected of·them ¬asserts lord

33 ¬that this ⁼the ⁼¬covenant °which I·will·¬make·a·covenant·myself to·the ⁼house of·Yisra’el with °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ ¬asserts lord ⁼giving I·will·give °laws⁺ of·me to °the ⁼¬mind of·them and upon °hearts⁺ of·them I·will·write °them and I·will·be·myself to·them to °God and they they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people

34 and not ńot they·should·teach each °the ⁼¬citizen of·him and each °the ⁼brother of·him saying ꜝknow °the ⁼lord ¬that all⁺ they·will·¬see °me off of·little of·them and till of·great of·them ¬that calm I·will·be·myself to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them not ńot I·should·be·memoried still

35 ifᵮ should·be·upped the ⁼heaven to °the ⁼¬meteorite ¬asserts lord and ifᵮ should·be·¬humbled °the ⁼¬ground of·the ⁼earth ¬under and I* not I·will·¬reject °the ⁼¬gens of·Yisra’el ¬asserts lord about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·did

36 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼giving °the ⁼sun to °light of·the ⁼day °luna and °stars⁺ to °light of·the ⁼night and °cry in to·sea and ¬??? °the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ of·her lord ⁼almighty name to·him

37 ifᵮ they·should·rest·themselves the⁺ ⁼laws⁺ ⁼these⁺ off of·face of·me ¬asserts lord and °the ⁼¬gens of·Yisra’el will·rest·himself to·self-be·generated °nation ¬by °face of·me °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·day

38 ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves ¬asserts lord and will·be·¬built city to·the ⁼lord off of·tower Anameēl till of·gate ⁼the ⁼¬corner

39 and will·come·out·himself the ⁼¬measurement of·her ¬opposite of·them till of·¬hills⁺ Garēb and will·be·¬surrounded ¬surrounding out of·¬select⁺ ⁼stones⁺

40 and all⁺ ⁼¬???s⁺ till ¬??? of·¬Kidron till of·¬corner ⁼gate of·horses⁺ of·¬east °holiness to·the ⁼lord and ¬not·any·more not ńot should·¬fail and not ńot should·be·¬taken·down till of·the ⁼eternity

39 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼tenth ⁼the ⁼king Sedekia this ⁼¬year ⁼¬eighteenth to·the ⁼king Nabouchodonosor to·king of·¬Babylon

2 and power of·king of·¬Babylon ¬built·a·palisade upon °Yerushalam and ¬Jeremiah kept·himself in to·¬palace of·the ⁼keep which is in to·house of·the ⁼king

3 in to·which ¬locked·up °him the ⁼king Sedekias ⁼saying through °what you you·¬prophesy saying thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·give °the ⁼city ⁼this in to·hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·take·himself °her

4 and Sedekias not ńot should·be·saved out of·hand of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ¬that to·¬tradition will·be·¬delivered to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·speak mouth of·him unto °mouth of·him and the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him they·will·see·themselves

5 and will·come·to·himself Sedekias to °¬Babylon and there will·¬seat·himself

6 and saying of·lord was·been·generated unto °¬Jeremiah saying

7 ¬¡see! Anameēl ⁼son Salōm ⁼brother ⁼father of·you comes·himself unto °you saying ꜝ¬possess·yourself to·yourself °the ⁼field of·me °the·one in Anathōth ¬that to·you °judgment to·¬take to °¬possession

8 and came unto °me Anameēl ⁼son Salōm ⁼brother ⁼father of·me to °the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep and told to·me ꜝ¬possess·yourself °the ⁼field of·me °the·one in to·earth of·¬Benjamin °the·one in Anathōth ¬that to·you °judgment to·self-¬possess and you ¬elder and I·knew ¬that saying of·lord is

9 and I·¬possessed·myself °the ⁼field Anameēl ⁼son ⁼brother ⁼father of·me and I·stood to·him seven °shekels⁺ and ten of·silver

10 and I·wrote to °booklet and I·sealed·myself and I·¬testified·solemnly·myself °witnesses⁺ and I·stood °the ⁼silver in to·yoke

11 and they·took °the ⁼booklet of·the ⁼¬possession °the ⁼having·self-sealed and °the·one °having·self-¬read

12 and I·gave °it to·the Barouch ⁼son Nēriou ⁼son Maasaiou ¬by °eyes⁺ Anameēl ⁼son ⁼brother ⁼father of·me and ¬by °eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼having·stood and of·writing in to·the ⁼booklet of·the ⁼¬possession and ¬by °eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep

13 and I·¬directed to·the Barouch ¬by °eyes⁺ of·them saying

14 thus told lord ⁼almighty ꜝtake °the ⁼booklet of·the ⁼¬possession °this and °the ⁼booklet ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬read and you·will·put °it to °¬jar ⁼¬clay so·that should·¬remain of·day ¬greater⁺

15 ¬that thus told lord still they·will·be·¬possessed fields⁺ and houses⁺ and vineyards⁺ in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this

16 and I·prayed·myself unto °lord with °the·one to·give °me °the ⁼booklet of·the ⁼¬possession unto Barouch ⁼son Nēriou saying

17 ¬oh! lord you you·did °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth to·the ⁼strength of·you to·the ⁼great and to·the ⁼arm of·you to·the ⁼upward and to·the ⁼¬meteorite not ńot should·be·¬concealed off of·you °no·one

18 doing °mercy to °thousands⁺ and ¬paying °sins⁺ of·fathers⁺ to °¬bosoms⁺ of·children⁺ of·them with °them the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼great and strong

19 ⁼lord of·great ⁼¬plan and potential to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼great ⁼the ⁼almighty and ¬??? lord the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you to °the⁺ ⁼paths⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ to·give to·each ¬by °the ⁼path of·him

20 which you·did °signs⁺ and °¬wonders in to·earth ⁼Egypt till of·the ⁼day ⁼this and in to·Yisra’el and in to·the·ones⁺ ¬??? and you·did to·yourself °name as the ⁼day ⁼this

21 and you·brought·out °the ⁼people of·you °Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt in to·signs⁺ and in to·¬wonderses⁺ and in to·hand ⁼mighty and in to·arm ⁼upward and in to·sights⁺ ⁼great⁺

22 and you·gave to·them °the ⁼earth ⁼this ⁼which you·¬swore to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey

23 and they·came·to and they·took °her and not they·heard of·the ⁼voice of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·you not they·were·gone °¬all⁺ ⁼which⁺ you·¬ordered·yourself to·them not they·did and you·did to·¬happen to·them °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼these⁺

24 ¬¡see! crowd arrives to °the ⁼city ⁼this to·¬seize °her and the ⁼city was·given to °hands⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warring °her off of·face °¬swords⁺ and of·the ⁼famine as you·spoke thus was·generated·himself

25 and you you·say unto °me ꜝ¬possess·yourself to·yourself °field of·silver and I·wrote °booklet and I·sealed·myself and I·¬testified·to·myself °witnesses⁺ and the ⁼city was·given to °hands⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺

26 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

27 I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·all ⁼flesh ńot off myˊ will·be·hidden °whatever

28 through °this thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el given will·be·¬delivered the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·take·himself °her

29 and they·will·arrive the·ones⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺ warring upon °the ⁼city ⁼this and they·will·¬kindle °the ⁼city ⁼this in to·fire and they·will·¬burn °the·ones⁺ of·house in to·which⁺ they·¬burned·incense upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬rooftops⁺ of·them to·the ⁼Baal and they·libated °libations⁺ to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ unto °the·one to·¬rebel °me

30 ¬that they·were the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yudah only⁺ ⁼doing °the ⁼evil ¬by °eyes⁺ of·me out of·youth of·them

31 ¬that upon °the ⁼raging of·me and upon °the ⁼¬wrath of·me was the ⁼city ⁼this off of·which ⁼day they·¬built °her and till of·the ⁼day ⁼this to·¬release °her off of·face of·me

32 through °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and of·Yudah of·which⁺ they·did to·¬embitter °me they and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam

33 and they·¬turned unto °me °spine and not °face and I·taught °them of·¬dawn and I·taught and not they·heard to·¬catch °¬discipline

34 and they·put °the⁺ ⁼defilements⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼house of·which was·¬called °the ⁼name of·me upon to·him in to·¬impurities⁺ of·them

35 and they·¬built °the⁺ ⁼¬altars⁺ to·the ⁼Baal °the·ones⁺ in to·¬valley of·son Ennom of·the·one to·¬bear·up °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them to·the ⁼Moloch ⁼king °which⁺ not I·¬directed to·them and not ascended upon °heart of·me of·the·one to·do °the ⁼¬abomination ⁼this unto °the·one to·¬tempt °the ⁼Yudah

36 and now thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el upon °the ⁼city ⁼which you you·say will·be·¬delivered to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon in to·¬sword and in to·famine and in to·¬apostleship

37 ¬¡see! I* I·¬assemble °them out of·all ⁼the ⁼earth of·which I·¬scattered °them there in to·raging of·me and to·the ⁼¬wrath of·me and to·¬stirring·up ⁼great and I·will·¬turn °them to °the ⁼¬place ⁼this and I·will·¬seat °them ⁼having·¬persuaded

38 and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·them to °God

39 and I·will·give to·them °path ⁼óther and °heart ⁼óther to·be·afraid °me °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ to °good to·them and to·the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·them with °them

40 and I·will·¬make·a·covenant·myself to·them °¬covenant ⁼eternal ⁼which not ńot I·will·¬turn·away ¬after of·them and °the ⁼fear of·me I·will·give to °the ⁼heart of·them unto °the·one ńot to·¬leave °them off myˊ

41 and I·will·¬visit·myself of·the·one to·¬do·good °them and I·should·¬plant °them in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this in to·¬trust and in to·all ⁼heart and in to·all ⁼soul

42 ¬that thus told lord ¬as they·¬brought·upon upon °the ⁼people ⁼this °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼great⁺ ⁼these⁺ thus I* I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke upon °them

43 and they·will·be·¬possessed still fields⁺ in to·the ⁼earth ⁼which you you·say ¬impassable is off of·humans⁺ and of·¬animal and they·were·¬delivered to °hands⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺

44 and they·will·¬possess·themselves °fields⁺ in to·silver and you·will·write °booklet and you·will·seal·yourself and should·¬testify·solemnly °witnesses⁺ in to·earth of·¬Benjamin and ¬surrounding to·Yerushalam and in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah and in to·cities⁺ of·the ⁼mountain and in to·cities⁺ of·the Sefēla and in to·cities⁺ of·the Nageb ¬that I·will·¬turn·away °the⁺ ⁼¬resettlements⁺ of·them

40 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah ⁼second and he was still having·self-bound in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep saying

2 thus told lord ⁼doing °earth and ¬molding °her of·the·one to·¬restore °her lord name to·him

3 ꜝhave·cried unto °me and I·will·be·answered to·you and I·will·¬announce to·you °great⁺ and °strong⁺ ⁼which⁺ not you·knew °them

4 ¬that thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el about of·houses⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this and about of·houses⁺ of·king ⁼Yudah of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬taken·down to °¬barricades⁺ and °¬battlements⁺

5 of·the·one to·self-¬quarrel unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and to·fulfill °her of·the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ °which⁺ I·¬struck in to·raging of·me and in to·¬wrath of·me and I·¬turned·away °the ⁼face of·me off of·them about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·them

6 ¬¡see! I* I·¬lead to·her °¬closing·of·a·wound and °¬healing and I·will·¬reveal to·them to·¬listen·to and I·will·¬treat °her and I·will·do to·them °peace and °¬trust

7 and I·will·¬turn °the ⁼¬resettlement of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬resettlement of·Yisra’el and I·will·¬build °them ¬as °the ⁼¬before

8 and I·will·cleanse °them off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them of·which⁺ they·sinned to·me and not ńot I·will·be·memoried of·sins⁺ of·them of·which⁺ they·sinned to·me and they·¬left off myˊ

9 and will·be·himself to °¬joy and to °praise and to °¬greatness to·all ⁼the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth whos⁺ they·will·hear·themselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I* I·will·do and they·will·be·afraid and they·will·be·¬embittered about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ and about of·all ⁼the ⁼peace ⁼which I* I·will·do to·them

10 thus told lord still will·be·heard in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ⁼which you⁺ you⁺·say ¬desert is off of·humans⁺ and of·¬animals⁺ in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬outside of·Yerushalam to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬layed·waste ¬from °the·one ńot to·be °human and °¬animals⁺

11 voice of·¬joy and voice of·¬joyfulness voice of·bridegroom and voice of·bride voice of·saying ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·lord ⁼almighty ¬that ¬good ⁼lord ¬that to °the ⁼eternity the ⁼mercy of·him and they·will·¬bear·in °¬gifts⁺ to °house of·lord ¬that I·will·¬turn·away °all ⁼the ⁼¬resettlement of·the ⁼earth ⁼that ¬by °the·one ¬previously told lord

12 thus told lord of·the⁺ ⁼powers⁺ still will·be·himself in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ⁼the·one to·¬desert ¬from °the·one ńot to·be °human and °¬animal and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·him °¬guest·rooms⁺ of·¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼bedding °sheep⁺

13 in to·cities⁺ of·the ⁼¬hilly and in to·cities⁺ of·the Sefēla and in to·cities⁺ of·the Nageb and in to·earth of·¬Benjamin and in to·the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding to·Yerushalam and in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah still will·¬pass·by·himself °sheep⁺ upon °hand of·numbering told lord

41 ⁼the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah ¬from of·lord and Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon and all ⁼the ⁼¬army·camp of·him and all ⁼the ⁼earth of·¬beginning of·him they·warred upon °Yerushalam and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah saying

2 thus told lord ꜝ¬proceed unto Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah and you·will·¬say to·him thus told lord to·¬tradition will·be·¬delivered the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·¬seize·himself °her and will·¬kindle °her in to·fire

3 and you not ńot you·should·be·saved out of·hand of·him and ¬??? you·will·be·¬seized and to °hands⁺ of·him you·will·be·given and the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·him they·will·see·themselves and the ⁼mouth of·him with of·the ⁼mouth of·you will·speak and to °¬Babylon you·will·come·to·yourself

4 but ꜝhear °the ⁼saying of·lord Sedekia ⁼king of·Yudah thus says lord

5 in to·peace you·will·die·off·yourself and as they·¬wept °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you °the⁺ ⁼becoming·king ¬previously of·you they·will·¬weep·themselves and °you and ¬oh! ¬??? they·will·chop·themselves °you ¬that °saying I* I·spoke told lord

6 and spoke ¬Jeremiah unto °the ⁼king Sedekian °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·Yerushalam

7 and the ⁼power of·king of·¬Babylon warred upon °Yerushalam and upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah upon Lachis and upon Azēka ¬that these⁺ they·were·¬left·behind in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah cities⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺

8 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah ¬from of·lord with °the·one to·¬complete °the ⁼king Sedekian °¬covenant unto °the ⁼people of·the·one to·call °¬forgiveness

9 of·the·one to·¬send·out °each ⁼the ⁼kid of·him and °each °the ⁼kidservant of·him °the ⁼¬Hebrew and °the ⁼Hebraic °¬free⁺ unto °the·one ńot to·serve °man out of·Yudah

10 and they·were·¬turned all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ and all ⁼the ⁼people the⁺ ⁼coming·to in to·the ⁼¬covenant of·the·one to·mission·off °each ⁼the ⁼kid of·him and °each °the ⁼kidservant of·him

11 and °¬allowing °them to °kids⁺ and °kidservants⁺

12 and was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah saying

13 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el I* I·put·myself °¬covenant unto °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼day ⁼which I·¬took·out·myself °them out of·earth ⁼Egypt out of·house of·servitude saying

14 ¬when should·be·fulfilled six °years⁺ you·will·mission·off °the ⁼brother of·you °the ⁼¬Hebrew which will·be·¬sold to·you and works·himself to·you six °years⁺ and you·will·¬send·out °him ⁼¬free and not they·heard of·me and not they·¬bowed °the ⁼ear of·them

15 and they·¬turned today to·do °the ⁼¬right ¬before of·eyes⁺ of·me of·the·one to·call °¬forgiveness °each of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him and they·¬completed °¬covenant ¬by °face of·me in to·the ⁼house of·which was·¬called the ⁼name of·me upon to·him

16 and you⁺·¬turned and you⁺·¬profaned °the ⁼name of·me of·the·one to·¬turn °each ⁼the ⁼kid of·him and °each °the ⁼kidservant of·him °which⁺ you⁺·¬sended·out °¬free⁺ to·the ⁼soul of·them to·you⁺ to °kids⁺ and °kidservants⁺

17 through °this thus told lord you⁺ not you⁺·heard of·me of·the·one to·call °¬forgiveness each unto °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ¬¡see! I* I·call °¬forgiveness to·you⁺ to °¬sword and to °the ⁼death and to °the ⁼famine and I·will·give °you⁺ to °¬dispersion to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ of·the ⁼earth

18 and I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬passed·by °the ⁼¬covenant of·me °the·ones⁺ ńot °standing °the ⁼¬covenant of·me °which they·did ¬by °face of·me °the ⁼calf ⁼which they·did to·self-work to·him

19 °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼potentates⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ and °the ⁼people

20 and I·will·give °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them and will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼¬decaying·flesh⁺ of·them ¬eating to·the⁺ ⁼wingling⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth

21 and °the Sedekian ⁼king of·the ⁼Yudaea and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them I·will·give to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·them and power of·king of·¬Babylon to·the·ones⁺ they·¬run·from off of·them

22 ¬¡see! I* I·¬direct ¬asserts lord and I·will·¬turn °them to °the ⁼earth ⁼this and they·will·war upon °her and they·will·take·themselves °her and they·will·¬burn °her in to·fire and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and I·will·give °them ⁼¬deserts⁺ off of·housing·down

42 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah ¬from of·lord in to·days⁺ Iōakim ⁼king ⁼Yudah saying

2 ꜝ¬proceed to °house ¬??? and you·will·bring °them to °house of·lord to °one of·the⁺ ⁼flutes⁺ and you·will·¬water °them °wine

3 and they·brought·out °the Iezonian ⁼son ¬??? of·son ¬??? and °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼house ¬???

4 and they·¬brought·in °them to °house of·lord to °the ⁼¬chamber of·sons⁺ of·¬Ananias ⁼son Godoliou ⁼human ⁼the ⁼God which is ¬near of·the ⁼house of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬above of·the ⁼house Maasaiou ⁼son Selōm ⁼the ⁼keeping °the ⁼¬palace

5 and I·gave ¬by °face of·them °pot of·wine and °¬cups⁺ and I·told ꜝdrink⁺ °wine

6 and they·told not ńot we·should·drink °wine ¬that Iōnadab ⁼son Rēchab the ⁼father of·us ¬ordered·himself to·us saying not ńot you⁺·should·drink °wine you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ till of·eternity

7 and °house not ńot you⁺·should·¬build and °seed not ńot you⁺·should·seed and vineyard not will·be·himself to·you⁺ ¬that in to·dwellings⁺ you⁺·will·house °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you⁺ ¬that iᵮ you⁺·should·live °days⁺ ⁼many⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth upon of·which you⁺·¬remain you⁺ upon of·her

8 and we·heard of·the ⁼voice Iōnadab ⁼the ⁼father of·us unto °the·one ńot to·drink °wine °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·us we and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·us and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·us and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·us

9 and unto °the·one ńot to·¬build of·house of·the·one to·house·down there and vineyard and field and seed not was·generated·himself to·us

10 and we·housed in to·dwellings⁺ and we·heard and we·did ¬by °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·us Iōnadab ⁼the ⁼father of·us

11 and was·been·generated when ascended Nabouchodonosor upon °the ⁼earth and we·¬said ꜝcome·to⁺ and we·should·come·to to °Yerushalam off of·face of·the ⁼power of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and off of·face of·the ⁼power of·the⁺ Assuriōn and we·housed there

12 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

13 thus says lord ꜝgo·yourself and they·told to·human of·Yudah and to·the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam not ńot you⁺·should·take °¬discipline of·the·one to·hear °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

14 they·stood °¬declaration sons⁺ Iōnadab ⁼son Rēchab which ¬ordered·himself to·the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·him unto °the·one ńot to·drink °wine and not they·drank and I* I·spoke unto °you⁺ of·¬dawn and I·spoke and not you⁺·heard

15 and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ saying ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ each off of·the ⁼path of·him of·the ⁼evil and °¬better ꜝdo⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and not you⁺·will·go·yourselves⁺ ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ of·the·one to·serve to·them and you⁺·will·house upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and not you⁺·¬bowed °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you⁺ and not you⁺·heard

16 and they·stood sons⁺ Iōnadab ⁼son Rēchab °the ⁼¬commandment of·the ⁼father of·them then the ⁼people ⁼this not they·heard of·me

17 through °this thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·bear upon °Yudah and upon °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke upon °them

18 through °this thus told lord ¬since they·heard sons⁺ Iōnadab ⁼son Rēchab °the ⁼¬commandment of·the ⁼father of·them to·do ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·them the ⁼father of·them

19 not ńot should·¬fail man of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Iōnadab ⁼son Rēchab having·¬stood·by ¬by °face of·me °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼earth

43 and in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼fourth Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °me saying

2 ꜝtake to·yourself °¬papyrus·paper of·booklet and ꜝwrite upon of·him °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬announced unto °you upon °Yerushalam and upon °Yudah and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ off of·which ⁼day of·speaking of·me unto °you off of·days⁺ of·¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah and till of·the ⁼day ⁼this

3 ¬perhaps will·hear·himself the ⁼house of·Yudah °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ I* I·¬count·myself to·do to·them so·that they·should·¬turn·away off of·path of·them of·the ⁼evil and calm I·will·be·myself to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them

4 and called ¬Jeremiah °the Barouch ⁼son Nēriou and wrote off of·mouth of·¬Jeremiah °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord °which⁺ ¬announced unto °him to °¬papyrus·paper of·booklet

5 and ¬ordered·himself ¬Jeremiah to·the Barouch saying I* I·keep·myself not ńot I·should·have·power·myself to·come·to to °house of·lord

6 and you·will·¬read·yourself in to·the ⁼¬papyrus·paper ⁼this to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼people in to·house of·lord in to·day of·fasting and in they·should·be of·all ⁼Yudah of·the⁺ ⁼self-coming out of·city of·them you·will·¬read·yourself to·them

7 ¬perhaps will·¬collapse·himself mercy of·them ¬by °face of·lord and they·will·¬turn·away out of·the ⁼path of·them of·the ⁼evil ¬that great ⁼the ⁼¬wrath and the ⁼raging of·lord °which spoke upon °the ⁼people ⁼this

8 and did Barouch ¬by °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him ¬Jeremiah of·the·one to·¬read in to·the ⁼booklet °sayings⁺ of·lord in to·house of·lord

9 and was·been·generated in to·the ⁼year to·the ⁼eighth ⁼king Iōakim ⁼the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼ninth they·¬assembled °fasting ¬by °face of·lord all ⁼the ⁼people in to·Yerushalam and house of·Yudah

10 and ¬read Barouch in to·the ⁼booklet °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·¬Jeremiah in to·house of·lord in to·house Gamariou ⁼son Safan ⁼the ⁼writer in to·the ⁼¬palace ⁼the·one ¬above in to·¬thresholds⁺ of·gate of·the ⁼house ⁼lord of·the ⁼new in they·should·be of·all ⁼the ⁼people

11 and heard Michaias ⁼son Gamariou ⁼son Safan °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord out of·the ⁼booklet

12 and descended to °house of·the ⁼king to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼writer and ¬¡see! there all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ they·¬sat·themselves Elisama ⁼the ⁼writer and Dalaias ⁼son Selemiou and Elnathan ⁼son ¬??? and Gamarias ⁼son Safan and Sedekias ⁼son of·¬Ananias and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺

13 and ¬announced to·them Michaias °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ heard of·¬reading ⁼the Barouch to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼people

14 and they·missioned·off all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ unto Barouch ⁼son Nēriou °the Ioudin ⁼son Nathaniou ⁼son Selemiou ⁼son Chousi saying °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper in to·which you you·¬read in to·it in they·should·be of·the ⁼people ꜝtake °it to °the ⁼hand of·you and arrived and took Barouch °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper and descended unto °them

15 and they·told to·him ¬again ꜝ¬read to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·us and ¬read Barouch

16 and was·been·generated as they·heard °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ they·¬consulted·themselves each unto °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him and they·told ¬announcing we·should·¬announce to·the ⁼king °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

17 and °the Barouch they·asked saying ¬whence you·wrote °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

18 and told Barouch off of·mouth of·him ¬announced to·me ¬Jeremiah °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ and they·wrote in to·booklet

19 and they·told to·the Barouch ꜝ¬proceed ꜝbe·¬hidden you and ¬Jeremiah ⁼human ńot ꜝlet·know ¬where? you⁺

20 and they·came·to unto °the ⁼king to °the ⁼¬palace and °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper they·gave to·keep in to·house Elisama and they·¬announced to·the ⁼king °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺

21 and missioned·off the ⁼king °the Ioudin to·take °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper and took °it out of·house Elisama and ¬read Ioudin to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼king and to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·stood about °the ⁼king

22 and the ⁼king ¬sat·himself in to·house ⁼¬of·winter and ¬grill of·fire ¬by °face of·him

23 and was·been·generated of·¬reading Ioudin °three⁺ ⁼¬columns⁺ and °four⁺ ¬??? °them to·the ⁼shaver of·the ⁼writer and ¬threw to °the ⁼fire ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼¬grill till ¬failed all ⁼the ⁼¬paper to °the ⁼fire ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼¬grill

24 and not they·sought and not they·¬tore °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them the ⁼king and the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·him the⁺ ⁼hearing °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

25 and Elnathan and Godolias and Gamarias ¬layed·himself to·the ⁼king unto °the·one ńot to·¬burn °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper

26 and ¬ordered·himself the ⁼king to·the Ieremeēl ⁼son of·the ⁼king and to·the Saraia ⁼son Esriēl to·¬seize °the Barouch and °the ⁼¬Jeremiah and they·were·¬hidden

27 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah with °the·one to·¬burn °the ⁼king °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ wrote Barouch off of·mouth of·¬Jeremiah saying

28 ¬again ꜝtake you °¬papyrus·paper ⁼óther and ꜝwrite °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being upon of·the ⁼¬papyrus·paper °which⁺ ¬burned the ⁼king Iōakim

29 and you·will·¬say thus told lord you you·¬burned °the ⁼¬papyrus·paper ⁼this saying through °what you·wrote upon to·it saying ⁼self-¬entering will·¬enter·himself the ⁼king of·¬Babylon and will·destroy °the ⁼earth ⁼this and will·¬fail off of·her human and ¬animals⁺

30 through °this thus told lord upon Iōakim ⁼king of·Yudah not will·be·himself to·him self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and the ⁼¬decaying·flesh of·him will·be·himself having·self-¬thrown in to·the ⁼¬heat of·the ⁼day and in to·the ⁼¬icy·coldness of·the ⁼night

31 and I·will·¬visit·myself upon °him and upon °the ⁼¬gens of·him and upon °the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·him and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them and upon °the⁺ ⁼housing·down °Yerushalam and upon °earth of·Yudah °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke unto °them and not they·heard

32 and took Barouch °¬papyrus·paper ⁼óther and wrote upon to·it off of·mouth of·¬Jeremiah °¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the ⁼booklet of·which ¬burned Iōakim and still they·were·¬added to·him sayings⁺ ⁼¬greater⁺ as these⁺

44 and became·king Sedekias ⁼son of·¬Josiah anti Iōakim °which became·king Nabouchodonosor to·become·king of·the ⁼Yudah

2 and not heard he and the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·him and the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord °which⁺ spoke in to·hand of·¬Jeremiah

3 and missioned·off the ⁼king Sedekias °the Iōachal ⁼son Selemiou and °the Sofonian ⁼son Maasaiou °the ⁼priest unto °¬Jeremiah saying ꜝpray·yourself ¬so about of·us unto °lord

4 and ¬Jeremiah came and ¬passed·through through of·middle of·the ⁼city and not they·gave °him to °house of·the ⁼keep

5 and power of·Pharaoh came·out out of·Egypt and they·heard the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ °the ⁼hearsay of·them and they·ascended off of·Yerushalam

6 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah saying

7 thus told lord thus you·will·¬say unto °king of·Yudah °the ⁼missioning·off unto °you of·the·one to·seek·out °me ¬¡see! power of·Pharaoh the ⁼coming·out to·you⁺ to °¬help they·will·¬turn·away to °earth of·Egypt

8 and they·will·¬live they ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and they·will·war upon °the ⁼city ⁼this and they·will·¬seize·themselves °her and they·will·¬kindle °her in to·fire

9 ¬that thus told lord ńot you⁺·should·¬take·up to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ saying ⁼¬running·from they·will·come·off·themselves off of·us the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ¬that not ńot they·should·come·off

10 and ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬strike °all ⁼power of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ °the⁺ ⁼warring °you⁺ and they·should·be·¬left·behind whatever⁺ ⁼having·self-¬pierced each in to·the ⁼¬place of·him these⁺ they·will·stand·uꝑ·themselves and they·will·¬kindle °the ⁼city ⁼this in to·fire

11 and was·generated·himself when ascended the ⁼power of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ off of·Yerushalam off of·face of·the ⁼power of·Pharaoh

12 came·out ¬Jeremiah off of·Yerushalam of·the·one to·be·gone to °earth of·¬Benjamin of·the·one to·¬buy ¬from·there in to·middle of·the ⁼people

13 and was·generated·himself he in to·gate of·¬Benjamin and there human ¬from to·which ¬destroyed Sarouias ⁼son Selemiou ⁼son ⁼¬Ananias and ¬seized °the ⁼¬Jeremiah saying unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ you you·flee

14 and told lie not to °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ I* I·flee and not heard of·him and ¬seized Sarouias °the ⁼¬Jeremiah and ¬brought·in °him unto °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺

15 and they·were·¬embittered the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ upon °¬Jeremiah and they·¬struck °him and they·missioned·off °him to °the ⁼house Iōnathan ⁼the ⁼writer ¬that °this they·did to °house of·keep

16 and came ¬Jeremiah to °house of·the ⁼¬pit and to °the·one ¬??? and ¬seated there °days⁺ ⁼many⁺

17 and missioned·off Sedekias and called °him and asked °him the ⁼king ¬secretly to·tell if is saying ¬from of·lord and told is to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon you·will·be·¬delivered

18 and told ¬Jeremiah to·the ⁼king what I·¬harmed °you and °the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·you and °the ⁼people ⁼this ¬that you you·give °me to °house of·keep

19 and ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying to·you⁺ saying ¬that not ńot should·come king of·¬Babylon upon °the ⁼earth ⁼this

20 and now lord ⁼king ꜝlet·¬collapse the ⁼mercy of·me ¬by °face of·you and °what you·¬turn·away °me to °house Iōnathan ⁼the ⁼writer and not ńot I·should·die·off there

21 and ¬directed the ⁼king and they·threw·in °him to °house of·the ⁼keep and they·gave·themselves to·him °bread ⁼one of·the ⁼day ¬outside of·which they·¬bake till they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ out of·the ⁼city and ¬seated ¬Jeremiah in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep

45 and heard Safatias ⁼son Mathan and Godolias ⁼son Paschōr and Iōachal ⁼son Selemiou °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ spoke ¬Jeremiah upon °the ⁼people saying

2 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼housing·down in to·the ⁼city ⁼this will·die·off·himself in to·sword and in to·famine and the ⁼self-going·out unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ will·live·himself and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·him to °¬finding and will·live·himself

3 ¬that thus told lord self-¬delivering will·be·¬delivered the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·power of·king of·¬Babylon and will·¬seize·himself °her

4 and they·told to·the ⁼king ꜝlet·be·¬killed ¬so the ⁼human ⁼that ¬that he ¬faints °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warring ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬leaving·behind in to·the ⁼city and °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·all ⁼the ⁼people speaking unto °them ¬by °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬that the ⁼human ⁼this not you·¬speak·oracles °peace to·the ⁼people ⁼this but or °evil⁺

5 and told the ⁼king ¬¡see! he in to·hands⁺ of·you⁺ ¬that not had·power·himself the ⁼king unto °them

6 and they·¬threw °him to °the ⁼¬pit Melchiou ⁼son ⁼the ⁼king which was in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep and they·¬lowered °him to °the ⁼¬pit and in to·the ⁼¬pit not was water but or ¬mire and was in to·the ⁼¬mire

7 and heard Abdemelech ⁼the ⁼Ethiopian and he in to·house of·the ⁼king ¬that they·gave °¬Jeremiah to °the ⁼¬pit and the ⁼king was in to·the ⁼gate of·¬Benjamin

8 and came·out unto °him and spoke unto °the ⁼king and told

9 you·¬acted·wickedly·yourself °which⁺ you·did of·the·one to·kill·off °the ⁼human ⁼this off of·face of·the ⁼famine ¬that not they·are still breads⁺ in to·the ⁼city

10 and ¬ordered·himself the ⁼king to·the Abdemelech saying ꜝtake to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you ¬from·here thirty °humans⁺ and ꜝ¬lead °him out of·the ⁼¬pit so·that ńot should·die·off

11 and took Abdemelech °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and came·to to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼king °the·one ¬??? and took ¬from·there °¬old⁺ ⁼¬cloths⁺ and °¬old⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ and ¬threw °them unto °¬Jeremiah to °the ⁼¬pit

12 and told °these⁺ ꜝput ¬under of·the⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ and did ¬Jeremiah thus

13 and they·¬drew °him to·the⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ and they·¬led °him out of·the ⁼¬pit and ¬seated ¬Jeremiah in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep

14 and missioned·off the ⁼king and called °him unto °himself to °house ¬??? °the·one in to·house of·lord and told to·him the ⁼king I·will·ask °you °saying and ńot ¬so you·should·hide off myˊ °¬declaration

15 and told ¬Jeremiah to·the ⁼king ifᵮ I·should·¬announce to·you ¬not! to·death °me you·will·put·to·death and ifᵮ I·will·¬consult to·you not ńot you·should·hear of·me

16 and ¬swore to·him the ⁼king ⁼saying lives lord ⁼which did to·us °the ⁼soul ⁼this if I·will·kill·off °you and if I·will·give °you to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺

17 and told to·him ¬Jeremiah thus told lord ifᵮ coming·out you·should·come·out unto °¬rulers⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·you and the ⁼city ⁼this not ńot should·be·¬burned in to·fire and you·will·live·yourself you and the ⁼house of·you

18 and ifᵮ ńot you·should·come·out will·be·given the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and they·will·¬kindle °her in to·fire and you not ńot you·should·be·saved

19 and told the ⁼king to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah I* °saying I·have of·the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·fled unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ńot to·be·going·to·give °me to °hands⁺ of·them and they·will·¬deride·themselves of·me

20 and told ¬Jeremiah not ńot they·should·¬deliver °you ꜝhear °the ⁼saying of·lord °which I* I·say unto °you and ¬better will·be·himself to·you and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·you

21 and if ńot you·will you to·come·out this ⁼the ⁼saying °which ¬showed to·me lord

22 and ¬¡see! all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼women⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬left·behind in to·house of·king ⁼Yudah they·brought·out·themselves unto °¬rulers⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and these⁺ they·said they·¬tricked °you and they·will·have·power·themselves to·you men⁺ ⁼peaceful⁺ of·you and they·will·¬destroy in ¬??? °feet⁺ of·you they·¬turned·away off of·you

23 and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼children⁺ of·you they·will·bring·out unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and you not ńot you·should·be·saved ¬that in to·hand of·king of·¬Babylon you·will·be·¬seized and the ⁼city ⁼this will·be·¬burned

24 and told to·him the ⁼king ⁼human ńot ꜝlet·know out of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you not ńot you·should·die·off

25 and ifᵮ they·should·hear the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ¬that I·spoke to·you and they·should·come unto °you and they·should·¬say to·you ꜝ¬announce to·us °what spoke to·you the ⁼king ńot you·should·hide off of·us and not ńot we·should·be·¬gone·up °you and °what spoke unto °you the ⁼king

26 and you·will·¬say to·them I·¬throw I* °the ⁼mercy of·me ¬by °eyes⁺ of·the ⁼king unto °the·one ńot to·¬turn·away °me to °house Iōnathan to·die·off there

27 and they·came all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ unto °¬Jeremiah and they·asked °him and ¬announced to·them ¬by °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him the ⁼king and they·¬kept·silent ¬that not was·heard saying of·lord

28 and ¬seated ¬Jeremiah in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼keep till of·¬time ⁼which was·¬seized Yerushalam

46 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼ninth of·the·one Sedekia of·king ⁼Yudah in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼tenth ¬came·himself Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon and all ⁼the ⁼power of·him upon °Yerushalam and they·¬assaulted °her

2 and in to·the ⁼eleventh ⁼year of·the·one Sedekia in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼fourth to·ninth of·the ⁼month was·¬thrown·violently the ⁼city

16 ꜝgo·yourself and they·told unto Abdemelech ⁼the ⁼Ethiopian thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·bear °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me upon °the ⁼city ⁼this to °bad⁺ and not to °good⁺

18 ¬that saving I·will·save °you and in to·sword not ńot you·should·¬collapse and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·you to °¬finding ¬that you·had·¬persuaded upon to·me* ¬asserts lord

47 ⁼the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah ¬later with °the·one to·mission·off °him Nabouzardan ⁼the ⁼¬chief·guard ⁼the·one out ¬??? in to·the·one to·take °him in to·¬manacleses⁺ in to·middle of·¬resettlement of·Yudah of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-brought to °¬Babylon

3 and did lord ¬that you⁺·sinned to·him and not you⁺·heard of·him of·the ⁼voice

4 ¬¡see! I·¬loosed °you off of·the⁺ ⁼¬manacleses⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you if °beautiful ¬in·front·of of·you to·come with myˊ to °¬Babylon arrived and I·will·put °the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·me upon °you

10 and ¬¡see! I* I·¬sit·myself ¬in·front·of of·you⁺ to Massēfa to·stand ¬by °face of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺ which⁺ iᵮ they·should·come upon °you⁺ and you⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °wine and °¬fruit and ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °¬olive·oil and ꜝthrow⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝhouse⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼which⁺ you⁺·¬held·firmly

16 and told Godolias unto Iōanan ńot you·should·do °the ⁼¬thing ⁼this ¬that °lying⁺ you you·say about Ismaēl

48 and was·generated·himself to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼seventh came Ismaēl ⁼son Nathaniou ⁼son Elasa off of·¬gens of·the ⁼king and ten men⁺ with of·him unto Godolian to Massēfa and they·¬ate there °bread ¬together

2 and stood·uꝑ Ismaēl and the·ones⁺ ten men⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·were with of·him and they·¬struck °the Godolian ⁼which ¬appointed king of·¬Babylon upon of·the ⁼earth

5 and they·came men⁺ off of·¬Shechem and off of·¬Salem and off of·¬Samaria eighty men⁺ ⁼having·self-shaved °beards⁺ and ¬??? °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ and self-chopping and ¬gift and incense in to·hands⁺ of·them of·the·one to·¬bear·in to °house of·lord

49 and they·came·unto all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼power and Iōanan and Azarias ⁼son Maasaiou and all ⁼the ⁼people off of·little till of·great

2 unto °¬Jeremiah ⁼the ⁼¬prophet and they·told to·him ꜝlet·¬collapse ¬so °the ⁼mercy of·us ¬by °face of·you and to·pray unto °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you about of·the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬that we·were·¬left·behind ¬few⁺ off of·many⁺ ¬as the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you they·look·at

3 and ꜝlet·¬announce to·us lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you °the ⁼path to·which we·will·go·ourselves in to·her and °saying ⁼which we·will·do

4 and told to·them ¬Jeremiah I·heard ¬¡see! I* I·will·pray·myself unto °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us ¬by °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you⁺ and will·be·himself the ⁼saying °which iᵮ will·be·answered lord I·will·¬announce to·you⁺ not ńot I·should·hide off of·you⁺ °¬declaration

5 and they they·told to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah ꜝlet·be lord in to·us to °witness ⁼just and °¬faithful if ńot ¬by °all ⁼the ⁼saying ⁼which iᵮ should·mission·off °you lord unto °us thus we·will·do

6 and ifᵮ °good and ifᵮ °bad °the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us of·which we we·mission·off °you unto °him we·will·hear·ourselves so·that ¬better to·us should·be·generated·himself ¬that we·will·hear·ourselves of·the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

7 and was·been·generated with ten °days⁺ was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah

9 and told to·them thus told lord

15 through °this ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord thus told lord ifᵮ you⁺ you⁺·should·give °the ⁼face of·you⁺ to °Egypt and you⁺·should·come·to there to·house·down

16 and will·be·himself the ⁼sword °which you⁺ you⁺·fear·yourselves⁺ off of·face of·her will·find °you⁺ in to·earth of·Egypt and the ⁼famine of·which you⁺ °saying you⁺·have off of·face of·him will·¬grasp·himself °you⁺ ¬after of·you⁺ in to·Egypt and there you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

2 and told Azarias ⁼son Maasaiou and Iōanan ⁼son Karēe and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬saying to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah saying °lies⁺ not missioned·off °you lord unto °us saying ńot you⁺·should·come·to to °Egypt to·house there

10 and you·will·¬say thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off and I·will·bring Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon and will·put of·him °the ⁼throne ¬above of·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ you·¬hid and will·¬take·up °the⁺ ⁼¬armors⁺ of·him upon °them

11 and will·come·to·himself and will·¬strike °earth of·Egypt °which⁺ to °death to °death and °which⁺ to °¬settlement to °¬settlement and °which⁺ to °sword to °sword

12 and will·¬kindle °fire in to·houses⁺ of·Gods⁺ of·them and will·¬burn °them and will·¬exile °them and will·¬fumigate °earth of·Egypt ¬just·as ¬fumigates ¬flocksman °the ⁼cloak of·him and will·come·out·himself in to·peace

13 and will·¬break °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·sun of·city °the·ones⁺ in to·which and °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them will·¬burn in to·fire

51 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah to·¬all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼housing·down in to·earth ⁼Egypt and to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting in ¬??? and in Tafnas and in to·earth Pathourēs saying

2 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el you⁺ you⁺·have·seen °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬brought·upon upon °Yerushalam and upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬¡see! they·are ¬deserts⁺ off ¬dwelling·in

3 off of·face of·evil of·them of·which they·did to·¬rebel °me gone to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ ⁼which⁺ not you⁺·knew

4 and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼kids⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬dawn and I·missioned·off saying ńot you⁺·should·do °the ⁼¬thing of·the ⁼¬contamination ⁼this ⁼which I·¬hated

5 and not they·heard of·me and not they·¬bowed °the ⁼ear of·them to·¬turn·away off of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·them unto °the·one ńot to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺

6 and ¬dripped the ⁼raging of·me and the ⁼¬wrath of·me and was·¬been·enflamed in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬outside of·Yerushalam and they·were·been·generated to °¬devastation and to °¬impassable as the ⁼day ⁼this

7 and now thus told lord ⁼almighty so·that °what you⁺ you⁺·do °bad⁺ ⁼great⁺ upon to·souls⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬prevent of·you⁺ °human and °woman °¬infant and °suckling out of·middle ⁼Yudah unto °the·one ńot to·be·¬left·behind of·you⁺ °¬nothing

8 ꜝ¬rebel·yourself °me in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt to °which you⁺·came·to to·¬dwell·in there so·that you⁺·should·¬prevent and so·that you⁺·should·be·generated·yourselves⁺ to °¬curse and to °¬reproach in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the ⁼earth

9 ńot you⁺·have·¬forgotten·yourselves⁺ you⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·you⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼bad⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·you⁺ of·which⁺ they·did in to·earth of·Yudah and ¬outside of·Yerushalam

10 and not they·rested·themselves till of·the ⁼day ⁼this and not they·¬clinged·to·themselves of·the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me of·which⁺ I·gave ¬by °face of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

11 through °this thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬approach °the ⁼face of·me

12 of·the·one to·destroy °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·Egypt and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·sword and in to·famine they·will·¬fail off of·little till of·great and they·will·be·themselves to °¬reproach and to °destruction and to °¬curse

13 and I·will·¬visit·myself upon °the⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting in to·earth ⁼Egypt as I·¬visited·myself upon °Yerushalam in to·sword and in to·famine and in to·death

14 and not will·be·himself having·self-saved ⁼no·one of·the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·Yudah of·the⁺ ⁼¬·a·stranger in to·earth ⁼Egypt of·the·one to·¬turn to °earth of·Yudah upon °which they they·hope to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them of·the·one to·¬turn there not ńot they·should·¬turn but or having·self-¬escaped

15 and they·were·answered to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼knowing ¬that they·¬burn·incense the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them to·Gods⁺ ⁼óther⁺ and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼women⁺ ¬synagogue ⁼great and all ⁼the ⁼people the⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting in to·earth ⁼Egypt in ¬??? saying

16 the ⁼saying °which you·spoke unto °us to·the ⁼name of·lord not we·will·hear of·you
